src: El dieciocho por ciento de los venezolanos no tiene empleo y la mayor parte de quienes sí lo tienen, trabajan en la informalidad. Dos tercios de los trabajadores venezolanos se desempeñan en el sector de servicios, alrededor de una cuarta parte trabaja en la industria y una quinta parte, en el sector agrícola. En Venezuela el petróleo es una industria importante, en la que el país es un exportador neto, aunque solo el 1% de su población trabaja en este sector.
mt: 18% of Venezuelans are unemployed and most of those who are employed work in the informal sector. Two thirds of Venezuelan workers are in the service sector, around a quarter work in industry and a fifth in agriculture. In Venezuela, oil is an important industry, in which the country is a net exporter, although only 1% of its population works in this sector.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: La luz y el calor que emana de las estrellas se genera cuando se unen (o fusionan) los átomos de hidrógeno para dar lugar a elementos más pesados. Los científicos concentran su trabajo en desarrollar un reactor capaz de generar energía de la misma forma. Sin perjuicio de ello, es un problema de muy difícil solución y no será factible lograr la construcción de reactores de fusión útiles sino hasta dentro de muchos años.
mt: The light and heat that emanates from stars is generated when atoms of hydrogen are joined (or fused) to form heavier elements. Scientists are concentrating their work on developing a reactor capable of generating energy in the same way. However, it is a very difficult problem to solve and it will not be feasible to build useful fusion reactors until many years from now.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: Los elementos y compuestos son capaces de cambiar de estado sin sufrir alteraciones. En su estado gaseoso, el nitrógeno mantiene las mismas propiedades que en su estado líquido. Aunque en el segundo caso es más denso, las moléculas siguen no varían. Otro ejemplo es el agua, que está formada por dos átomos de hidrógeno y uno de oxígeno. Presenta la misma estructura molecular, sea en estado líquido, sólido o gaseoso. Aunque su estado físico puede variar, el químico se mantiene.
mt: Elements and compounds are capable of changing state without suffering alterations. In its gaseous state, nitrogen maintains the same properties as in its liquid state. Although in the second case it is denser, the molecules still do not vary. Another example is water, which is formed by two atoms of hydrogen and one of oxygen. It has the same molecular structure, whether in liquid, solid or gaseous state. Although its physical state can vary, the chemist remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: Durante la Guerra de la Revolución, los trece estados formaron, en un principio, un gobierno central endeble bajo los Artículos de la Confederación, en el que el congreso era su único componente. El Congreso no contaba con facultades para fijar impuestos y, dado que se contaba con un poder ejecutivo o judicial nacional, tal función recaía en las autoridades de los estados, que con frecuencia no cooperaban para hacer cumplir todas sus leyes. Tampoco estaba facultado para anular leyes fiscales o aranceles entre estados. Los artículos demandaban la aprobación unánime de todos los estados para proceder a su enmienda y los estados le daban tan poca importancia al gobierno central que sus representantes solían ausentarse.
mt: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states initially formed a weak central government under the Articles of Confederation, in which the Congress was its only component. Congress had no power to levy taxes and, since there was no national executive or judiciary, such power rested with the states, which often failed to cooperate in enforcing all their laws. It also lacked the power to nullify state tax or tariff laws. The Articles required unanimous approval of all states to amend them and the states gave so little importance to the central government that their representatives often absented themselves.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: Si ha visto el filme Tesoro Nacional, quizás crea que un mapa del tesoro fue trazado en el dorso de la Declaración de la Independencia. No obstante, eso no es cierto. Si bien el reverso del documento contiene algo escrito, no se trata de un mapa de un tesoro. La Declaración de la Independencia tiene escrito en su reverso la frase «Declaración de Independencia original del 4 de julio de 1776». El texto figura en la parte inferior del documento, boca abajo. Aunque se desconoce a ciencia cierta quién lo redactó, se sabe que apenas fue confeccionado, el enorme documento de pergamino (mide 29¾ pulgadas por 24½ pulgadas) fue enrollado para ser guardado. Por tanto, es probable que la anotación haya sido agregada tan solo como un rótulo.
mt: If you've seen the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was drawn on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that's not true. While the reverse of the document does contain some writing, it's not a map of a treasure. The Declaration of Independence has written on its reverse the phrase "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776." The text appears at the bottom of the document, upside down. While it is unknown who wrote it, it is known that only after it was completed, the enormous parchment (29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up to be stored. Therefore, it is likely that the annotation was added simply as a label.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Después de que la nación declaró su independencia, la experticia de los Jardines Botánicos de Singapur ayudaron a transformar la isla en una ciudad jardín tropical. En 1981, se eligió a la orquídea de Singapur, que es un cultivo híbrido, como la flor nacional.
mt: After the nation declared its independence, the expertise of the Singapore Botanic Gardens helped transform the island into a tropical garden city. In 1981, the Singapore orchid, a hybrid cultivar, was chosen as the national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Si bien las pirámides de piedra continuaron construyéndose hasta el final del Reino Antiguo, nunca pudo superarse a las de Guiza, ni en tamaño ni en lo sublime de la técnica de su edificación. El antiguo pueblo egipcio del Imperio Nuevo quedó maravillado con los monumentos de sus antepasados, que en ese entonces databan de más de un milenio.
mt: While stone pyramids continued to be built until the end of the Old Kingdom, none could surpass those of Giza, neither in size nor in the sublime technique of their construction. The ancient Egyptian people of the New Kingdom were awed by the monuments of their ancestors, which at that time dated back more than a millennium.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Todos los años, cerca de octubre, aproximadamente 1,5 millones de herbívoros emigran hacia las tierras llanas del sur, atravesando el río Mara, desde las colinas del norte, en busca de las lluvias. Y después, regresan al norte por el oeste, nuevamente atravesando el río Mara, una vez concluidas las lluvias, cerca de abril. En la región de Serengeti se encuentra el Parque Nacional del Serengeti, la Zona de Conservación de Ngorongoro y la Reserva de Caza Maswa, todas ellas en Tanzania. En Kenia se localiza la Reserva Nacional Massai Mara.
mt: Every year, around October, approximately 1.5 million herbivores migrate southwards to the plains, crossing the Mara River from the hills of the north, in search of the rains. And then, they return to the north by the west, crossing the Mara River again, once the rains are over, around April. In the Serengeti region is the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and the Maswa Game Reserve, all in Tanzania. In Kenya is the Masai Mara National Reserve.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: Al finalizar la batalla por Francia, Alemania empezó a planificar la invasión de la isla de Gran Bretaña. Alemania asignó al ataque el nombre en clave de «Operación Lobo Marino». El ejército británico estaba bastante débil, debido a que había perdido la mayoría de las armas pesadas y los suministros durante su evacuación de Dunkerque. Pero la Marina Real todavía era mucho más fuerte que la alemana (Kriegsmarine) y hubiese abatido a cualquier flota invasora que pretendiera ingresar por Canal de la Mancha. Pese a ello, eran muy pocas las bases de los buques de la Marina Real que se ubicaban cerca de las posibles rutas de invasión, ya que los almirantes temían que el ataque aéreo alemán los hundiera.
mt: After the battle for France, Germany began planning the invasion of the island of Great Britain. Germany assigned the attack the codename of "Operation Sealion". The British Army was quite weak, having lost most of its heavy weapons and supplies during its evacuation from Dunkirk. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (Kriegsmarine) and would have sunk any invading fleet that attempted to enter the Channel. Nevertheless, there were very few bases for the ships of the Royal Navy near the possible invasion routes, as the admirals feared that the German air attack would sink them.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: Comencemos explicando los planes de Italia. Fundamentalmente, Italia era el «hermano menor» de Alemania y Japón. Su ejército y marina eran más débiles, aunque cuatro barcos nuevos acababan de ser construidos justo antes del inicio de la guerra. Italia tenía como objetivo primordial a los países africanos. Para capturarlos, precisaría una plataforma de lanzamiento de tropas para que estas pudieran navegar por el Mar Mediterráneo y, así, invadir África. Para ello, debieron deshacerse de las bases y los barcos británicos localizados en Egipto. Se suponía que, aparte de esas medidas, los acorazados italianos no tenían que hacer nada más. Ahora, Japón. Este es un país insular, al igual que Gran Bretaña.
mt: Let's start by explaining Italy's plans. Basically, Italy was the "younger brother" of Germany and Japan. Its army and navy were weaker, although four new ships had just been built before the start of the war. Italy's primary objective was to capture the African countries. To do so, it would need a staging platform for troops to sail across the Mediterranean Sea and, thus, invade Africa. It would have to get rid of the British bases and ships located in Egypt. Apart from those measures, the Italian battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now, Japan. This is an island country, just like Great Britain.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: Si bien los desembarcos llevados a cabo durante el Día D, así como los subsiguientes enfrentamientos, habían logrado la liberación del norte de Francia, aún restaba el lado sur. Su gobierno estuvo en manos de los franceses de «Vichy», que eran un grupo que, en 1940, habían acordado la paz con los alemanes y trabajaban con los invasores en lugar de pelear contra ellos. El 15 de agosto de 1940, se desplegó la denominada «Operación Dragón», a través de la cual los Aliados invadieron el sur de Francia. En apenas dos semanas, las fuerzas norteamericanas y las de la Francia Libre habían logrado la liberación del sur de Francia y seguían rumbo a Alemania.
mt: While the landings carried out during D-Day, as well as the subsequent battles, had achieved the liberation of northern France, the south still remained. Its government was in the hands of the "Vichy" French, who in 1940 had agreed to peace with the Germans and worked with the invaders instead of fighting against them. On August 15, 1940, the so-called "Operation Dragon" was deployed, through which the Allies invaded southern France. In just two weeks, American and Free French forces had achieved the liberation of southern France and were on their way to Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Los submarinos son naves diseñadas para desplazarse y permanecer por bajo del agua durante un largo período de tiempo. Durante la Primera y la Segunda Guerra Mundial se utilizaron submarinos. En ese entonces, eran muy lentos y su rango de disparo muy limitado. Al comienzo de la guerra, viajaban principalmente sobre el nivel del mar, pero, a medida que se desarrollaron los radares y adquirieron mayor precisión, los submarinos se vieron forzados a sumergirse para evitar ser detectados. Los submarinos alemanes se denominaron U-Boote. Los alemanes eran muy buenos para la navegación y operación de sus submarinos. Dado su éxito con los submarinos, desde la guerra no genera confianza que los alemanes sean dueños de grandes cantidades de este tipo de naves.
mt: Submarines are designed to travel and remain underwater for a long period of time. During the First and Second World War submarines were used. At that time they were very slow and had a very limited range of fire. At the beginning of the war they mainly traveled on the surface of the water, but as radars developed and became more accurate, submarines were forced to submerge to avoid being detected. The German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Given their success with submarines, since the war there has been no confidence that the Germans are owners of large quantities of this type of ships.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Debido a que para el 17 de septiembre de 1939 la defensa polaca ya estaba quebrada, su única esperanza era dar la retirada y reorganizarse en la extensión de la cabeza de puente rumana. No obstante, estos planes cayeron en desuso casi de un día para otro, cuando más de 800 000 combatientes del Ejército Rojo de la Unión Soviética ingresaron y formaron los frentes bielorruso y ucraniano luego de invadir las regiones del este de Polonia, infringiendo el Tratado de Paz de Riga, el pacto de No Agresión soviético-polaca y otros acuerdos internacionales, bilaterales y multilaterales.
mt: Because by September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, its only hope was to retreat and reorganize in the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans fell by the wayside almost overnight, when more than 800,000 combatants of the Soviet Red Army entered and formed the Belorussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland, violating the Treaty of Riga, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other bilateral and multilateral agreements.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Casi desde el comienzo, a los italianos no les fue bien en África del Norte. Pasada una semana desde que el país declarara la guerra el 10 de junio de 1940, los undécimos húsares británicos ya habían tomado el Fuerte Capuzzo, en Libia. El general Lastucci, ingeniero en jefe del Décimo Ejército de Italia, fue atrapado por los ingleses durante una emboscada al este de Bardia. Fuego aliado eliminó, el 28 de junio, al mariscal Italo Balbo, gobernador general de Libia, y supuesto sucesor de Mussolini, durante su aterrizaje en Tobruk.
mt: Almost from the start, the Italians did not fare well in North Africa. Passed a week since the country declared war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had already taken Fort Capuzzo, in Libya. General Lastucci, chief engineer of the Tenth Italian Army, was ambushed by the English to the east of Bardia. Allied fire eliminated, on June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, governor general of Libya, and supposed successor of Mussolini, during his landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Si bien las bases del budismo tibetano son las enseñanzas de Buda, se extendieron por el sendero del amor Mahayana y numerosas técnicas del yoga de la India. En términos generales, el laísmo es muy sencillo. Se basa en el kundalini yoga, la meditación y el camino del amor que todo lo abarca. En Kundalini Yoga, la energía Kundalini (iluminación) se activa con posiciones de yoga, prácticas de respiración, mantras o visualizaciones. La meditación tibetana se centra en el Devata Yoga. A través de la visualización de distintas deidades, pueden desobstaculizarse los canales de energía, activarse los chakras y desarrollar la conciencia de la iluminación.
mt: While the foundations of Tibetan Buddhism are the teachings of the Buddha, they were extended along the path of love Mahayana and numerous techniques of yoga of India. In general terms, the laism is very simple. It is based on Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of love that encompasses all. In Kundalini Yoga, the Kundalini energy (illumination) is activated with yoga positions, breathing practices, mantras or visualizations. Tibetan meditation focuses on Devata Yoga. Through the visualization of different deities, can be unobstaculized the energy channels, activate the chakras and develop the consciousness of illumination.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: El inicio del programa tuvo lugar a las 8:30 p. m. hora local (15:00 UTC). Reconocidos cantantes nacionales interpretaron bhajans, o canciones de devoción, a los pies del Shri Shyam. El cantante Sanju Sharma fue quien inauguró el evento y le siguió Jai Shankar Choudhary. También interpretó el chhappan bhog bhajan, junto al cantante Raju Khandelwal. Después de eso, Lakkha Singh pasó al frente para cantar los bhajans. Baba Shyam fue honrado con 108 platos de Chhappan Bhog que, en la religión hindú, consiste en 56 piezas comestibles distintas, como dulces, frutas, nueces, platos, entre otros, que se sirven como ofrenda al dios. Además, Lakkha Singh interpretó el chhappan bhog bhajan junto al cantante Raju Khandekwak.
mt: The program began at 8:30 p.m. local time (15:00 UTC). National singers performed bhajans, or devotional songs, at the feet of Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma opened the event and was followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. He also performed the chhappan bhog bhajan, along with singer Raju Khandelwal. After that, Lakkha Singh stepped forward to sing the bhajans. Baba Shyam was honored with 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog, which, in Hindu religion, consists of 56 different edible items, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes, among others, that are served as an offering to the god. In addition, Lakkha Singh performed the chhappan bhog bhajan along with singer Raju Khandekwak.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. src: Se dio inicio a las celebraciones con un espectáculo especial en manos del globalmente famoso Cirque du Soleil. Luego se presentó la Orquesta Sinfónica del Estado de Estambul, un grupo de Janissary y Fatih Erkoç y Müslüm Gürses, ambos cantantes. Más tarde, Whirling Derviches hizo su aparición en el escenario. La diva turca Sezen Aksu cantó con Alessandro Safina, un tenor italiano, y con la cantante griega Haris Alexiou. Para terminar, el grupo de danza turco Anatolia interpretó «Troya».
mt: The celebrations began with a special show by the globally famous Cirque du Soleil. Then the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a group of Janissary, and Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses, both singers, performed. Later, Whirling Derviches appeared on stage. The Turkish diva Sezen Aksu sang with Alessandro Safina, an Italian tenor, and with the Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, the Turkish dance group Anatolia performed "Troya".
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Los pasajeros pudieron beber agua mientras esperaban a una temperatura de 90 °F. Scott Kouns, capitán del cuartel de bomberos, comentó: «Era un día de calor en Santa Clara, con temperaturas de 90 grados. Sea cual sea el tiempo que podría pasarse atrapado en una montaña rusa, resultaría incómodo, como mínimo, y llevó al menos una hora lograr descender a la primera persona del juego».
mt: Passengers were able to drink water while waiting at 90 °F. Santa Clara Fire Captain Scott Kouns commented, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara, with temperatures of 90 degrees. Whatever time could be spent trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, at least, and took at least an hour to descend to the first person of the ride."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Conforme surge del último informe, las lecturas del nivel del mar señalan la formación de un tsunami y se detectó cierta actividad de este fenómeno en las cercanías de Pago Pago y Niue. No se han informado mayores daños o heridos en Tonga, pero se interrumpió el servicio de electricidad de forma temporal, lo que, se supone, frustró la recepción por las autoridades tonganas de la advertencia de tsunami emitida por el PTWC. Catorce escuelas en la costa de Hawái o en el área cercana a ella cerraron completamente el miércoles, a pesar de que se levantaron las advertencias.
mt: As the latest report emerges, sea level readings indicate the formation of a tsunami and some activity of this phenomenon was detected near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but temporary power outages are believed to have prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools on the coast of Hawaii or in the nearby area closed Wednesday, despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, copiloto del equipo de Nueva Zelanda de A1GP, hizo historia hoy al consagrarse lícitamente como el conductor más veloz sobre el puente de Auckland Harbour, de 48 años de antigüedad, en Nueva Zelanda. Reid logró conducir siete veces a través del puente y superando los 160 km/h el Belleza Negra, el automóvil A1GP de Nueva Zelanda. Debido a lo bajo que se encuentra Black Beauty, fue difícil para la policía de Nueva Zelanda determinar con sus radares de velocidad cuán rápido iba el Sr. Reid y en el único momento en el que pudieron medir su tiempo fue cuando desaceleró a 160 km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver of the New Zealand A1GP team, made history today by legally becoming the fastest driver over the Auckland Harbour Bridge, 48 years old, in New Zealand. Reid managed to drive seven times through the bridge and exceeding 160 km/h the Black Beauty, the A1GP car of New Zealand. Due to how low Black Beauty is, it was difficult for the New Zealand police to determine with their speed radars how fast Mr. Reid was going and in the only moment they could measure his time was when he decelerated to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Un terremoto de intensidad moderada hizo temblar el oeste de Montana a las 10:08 p. m. del lunes. Ni en el Servicio Geológico de los Estados Unidos (USGS) ni en su Centro Nacional de Información Sísmica se han reportado daños de forma directa. El epicentro del sismo se localizó cerca de 20 km (15 mi) al nornoreste de Dillon y a casi 65 km (40 mi) al sur de Butte.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. Monday. Neither the U.S. Geological Survey nor its National Earthquake Information Center has reported any direct damage. The epicenter of the quake was located about 20 km (15 mi) northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 mi) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: La prisión de Abu Ghraib en Irak se incendió durante un motín. La cárcel se hizo conocida después de que salieran a la luz los abusos de prisioneros, luego de que las fuerzas norteamericanas asumieran el mando.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq burned during a riot. The prison became known after abuses of prisoners were revealed after U.S. forces took control.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: El grupo canceló la función en el War Memorial Stadium de Maui, al que asistirían 9000 personas, y ofreció una disculpa a sus seguidores. El día de la cancelación; esto es, el 20 de septiembre, la empresa que administra la banda, HK Management Inc., no indicó los motivos iniciales que la provocaron, mas, al día siguiente, atribuyó lo sucedido a cuestiones de tipo logísticas.
mt: The group cancelled a show at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, which would have been attended by 9,000 people, and offered an apology to its fans. On the day of the cancellation, September 20, the band's management company, HK Management Inc., did not initially indicate the reasons for the cancellation, but the following day attributed it to logistical issues.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Se informó que los saqueos generalizados se extendieron toda la noche, dado que no hubo presencia policial en las calles de Bishkek. Un observador describió a Bishkek como si se hundiera en un estado de «anarquía» mientras grupos de personas vagaban por las calles y saqueaban las tiendas de venta de bienes de consumo. Varios habitantes de Biskek culparon a los manifestantes del sur por el desenfreno.
mt: It was reported that widespread looting continued through the night, as police were not present on the streets of Bishkek. An observer described Bishkek as if it were sinking into a state of "anarchy" as groups of people roamed the streets and looted consumer goods stores. Several Bishkek residents blamed the southern protesters for the chaos.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Con anterioridad, el director ejecutivo de Ring, Jamie Siminoff, mencionó que la compañía había iniciado a raíz de que el timbre de su entrada no podía oírse desde la tienda que tenía montada en su garaje. Él dijo que construyó un timbre wifi. Siminoff declaró que las ventas se dispararon luego de su aparición en un episodio de Shark Tank en el año 2013, en el que el panel del programa televisivo se negó a financiar la puesta en marcha de la compañía. Hacia fines del año 2017, Siminoff hizo una aparición en el canal de compras televisadas QVC. Ring también llegó a un acuerdo en el litigio con la compañía de seguridad de la competencia, ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff mentioned that the company was started after the doorbell at his garage store could not be heard from the store. He said he built a wifi doorbell. Siminoff stated that sales skyrocketed after his appearance on Shark Tank in 2013, in which the show's panel rejected funding the company's launch. By the end of 2017, Siminoff made an appearance on the shopping channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with security company competitor ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: El programa de PBS tiene más de veinticuatro premios Emmy y su duración es más breve que la de Plaza Sésamo y el Vecindario del Señor Roger. Cada episodio del programa se desarrollaría en torno a una temática abordada por un libro en particular y luego se exploraría ese tema mediante múltiples historias. En cada episodio, además, se brindaba información sobre libros que recomendaban que los niños leyeran cuando visitaran una biblioteca. John Grant, de WNED Buffalo (la estación más importante de Reading Rainbow) señaló que el programa «les enseñó a los más pequeños la razón de leer, […] el amor por la lectura; los incentivó a tomar un libro y leer». Hay quienes piensan, incluido John Grant, que tanto la crisis financiera como una modificación en la filosofía de la programación televisiva con fines educativos ayudaron a la cancelación de la serie.
mt: PBS's Reading Rainbow has won more than twenty-four Emmys and is shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the program would be built around a theme explored by a particular book and then that theme would be explored through multiple stories. In each episode, information was also provided about books that recommended children read when they visited a library. John Grant of WNED Buffalo (the most important station of Reading Rainbow) said the program "taught the youngest the reason to read, [...] the love of reading; encouraged them to take a book and read." Some think, including John Grant, that both the financial crisis and a change in the philosophy of educational television programming helped to cancel the series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Las autoridades de Ámsterdam y del Museo de Ana Frank sostienen que un hongo ha infectado el árbol y que es peligroso para la salud pública porque corre el riesgo inminente de caer. Su tala se había programado para el día martes, pero fue salvado después de un fallo judicial de emergencia.
mt: Authorities in Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say a fungus has infected the tree and is dangerous to public health because it is at imminent risk of falling. Its felling was scheduled for Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency injunction.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: El movimiento Liberación Animal y la Real Sociedad para la Prevención de la Crueldad contra los Animales (RSPCA) nuevamente reclaman la instalación obligatoria de cámaras de videovigilancia en todos los mataderos de Australia. David, O'Shannessy, jefe de inspección de la RSPCA Nueva Gales del Sur, afirmó a ABC que en Australia debería ser algo normal someter a vigilancia e inspecciones a los mataderos. «Al instalar un circuito cerrado de televisión, de seguro se estará enviando un mensaje contundente a aquellos que trabajan con animales de que su bienestar es de prioridad capital».
mt: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) again call for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. David O'Shannessy, RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector, told ABC that in Australia it should be normal to submit abattoirs to surveillance and inspections. "By installing a closed circuit television, you are sure to be sending a strong message to those who work with animals that their welfare is of paramount importance."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: El movimiento Liberación Animal y la Real Sociedad para la Prevención de la Crueldad contra los Animales (RSPCA) nuevamente reclaman la instalación obligatoria de cámaras de videovigilancia en todos los mataderos de Australia. David, O'Shannessy, jefe de inspección de la RSPCA Nueva Gales del Sur, afirmó a ABC que en Australia debería ser algo normal someter a vigilancia e inspecciones a los mataderos. «Al instalar un circuito cerrado de televisión, de seguro se estará enviando un mensaje contundente a aquellos que trabajan con animales de que su bienestar es de prioridad capital».

src: Hoy, mientras se llevaban a cabo los funerales de Jeff Weise y de tres de las nueve víctimas, se difundió la noticia en la comunidad de Red Lake de que se arrestó a otro estudiante en relación a los tiroteos en la escuela el 21 de marzo. Las autoridades hicieron pocas declaraciones oficiales aparte de confirmar el arresto de hoy. No obstante, una fuente cercana a la investigación comentó al Minneapolis Star-Tribune que era Louis Jordain, de 16 años, hijo de Floyd Jourdain, presidente de la tribu Red Lake. Por el momento, no se sabe qué cargos se imputarán o qué condujo a las autoridades hasta el niño, pero se ha dado inicio a procedimientos penales de menores en el tribunal federal.
mt: Today, as the funerals of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were being held, news spread in the Red Lake community that another student had been arrested in connection with the shootings at the school on March 21. Authorities made few official statements other than confirming the arrest today. However, a source close to the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jordain, 16, son of Floyd Jourdain, president of the Red Lake tribe. At this time, it is not known what charges will be filed or what led authorities to the boy, but proceedings have begun in juvenile court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Quienes organizaron la manifestación afirmaron que cerca de 100 000 personas participaron en ciudades de Alemania como Berlín, Colonia, Hamburgo y Hannover. La fuerza policial calculó 6500 manifestantes en Berlín. Las manifestaciones tuvieron lujar, además, en París; Sofía, Bulgaria; Vilnius, Lituania; Valetta, Malta; Tallin, Estonia y Edimburgo y Glasgow, Escocia. En Londres, cerca de 200 personas se manifestaron afuera de las oficinas de algunos de los propietarios de derechos de autor más importantes. El mes pasado, se llevaron a cabo importantes manifestaciones en Polonia cuando el país firmó el ACTA, lo que causó que el gobierno polaco decidiera no ratificar el acuerdo, por el momento. Tanto Letonia como Eslovaquia han demorado el procedimiento de unión al ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people in Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, and 6,500 in Berlin, according to police, protested in cities across Germany. Protests also took place in Paris; Sofia, Bulgaria; Vilnius, Lithuania; Valetta, Malta; Tallin, Estonia and Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside the offices of some of the most important copyright owners. Last month, major protests took place in Poland when the country signed the ACTA, causing the Polish government to decide not to ratify the agreement, for now. Both Latvia and Slovakia have delayed the process of joining the ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Se han denunciado cerca de 60 casos de iPods con problemas de funcionamiento y calentamiento exesivo, lo que originó seis incendios y provocó quemaduras menores a cuatro personas. El Ministerio de Economía, Comercio e Industria japonés (METI) informó haber registrado 27 accidentes que involucraban a estos aparatos. La semana pasada, METI anunció que Apple les había informado de 34 incidentes adicionales de sobrecalentamiento, que la compañía catalogó como «no graves». El ministerio se pronunció en relación al retraso en el informe de Apple, diciendo que era algo «verdaderamente lamentable».
mt: 60 cases of iPods with malfunctioning and excessive heating have been reported, resulting in six fires and causing minor burns to four people. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) reported having registered 27 accidents involving these devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed them of an additional 34 incidents of overheating, which the company classified as "not serious". The ministry commented on Apple's delay in reporting, saying it was "truly regrettable".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Al subir a escenario, el director ejecutivo de Apple, Steve Jobs, presentó el dispositivo sacando el IPhone del bolsillo de su bluyín. En su discurso, de dos horas, expresó: «Hoy Apple va a reinventar el teléfono. Este día haremos historia».
mt: As he took the stage, Apple CEO Steve Jobs pulled the iPhone from his jeans pocket. In his two-hour presentation, he said: "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone. This day we will make history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, quien a la fecha ocupa el cargo de senadora y es la primera dama de la República Argentina, anunció anoche en La Plata, ciudad ubicada a 50 kilómetros (31 millas) de Buenos Aires, que se postulará para la presidencia. El Teatro Argentino fue el lugar donde la señora Kirchner anunció su intención de candidatearse como presidenta; este es el mismo sitio donde inició su campaña para el senado en el año 2005, en representación de la provincia de Buenos Aires.
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, who currently holds the position of senator and is the first lady of the Argentine Republic, announced last night in La Plata, a city located 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, that she will run for president. The Teatro Argentino was the place where Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president; this is the same site where she began her campaign for the senate in 2005, representing the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: La Autoridad Australiana de Comunicaciones y Medios (ACMA) también decidió que, aun cuando el video fue transmitido por internet, Gran hermano no había infringido las leyes de censura de contenidos en línea, ya que no se había almacenado en la página web de Gran hermano. La Ley de Servicios de Radiodifusión prevé la regulación de los contenidos de Internet, pero para que algo sea considerado como contenido de Internet debe residir en un servidor físicamente.
mt: The Australian Communications and Media Authority (ACMA) also decided that, although the video was broadcast over the Internet, Big Brother had not infringed the laws of Internet content censorship, as the content had not been stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, but for something to be considered Internet content it must reside on a physical server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: El tesorero australiano, Peter Costello, que es el sucesor más factible del primer ministro John Howard al frente del partido Liberal, ha respaldado a la industria de energía nuclear en Australia. El Sr. Costello sostuvo que, cuando la generación de energía nuclear se volviera viable en términos económicos, Australia debería seguir haciendo uso de ella. «Si se empieza a comercializar, deberíamos tenerla. Es decir, en principio, no hay reparos en contra de la energía nuclear», comentó Costello.
mt: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello, the most likely successor to Prime Minister John Howard at the helm of the Liberal Party, has backed Australia's nuclear energy industry. Mr. Costello said that when nuclear energy generation became economically viable, Australia should continue to use it. "If it starts to be commercialized, we should have it. That is, in principle, there are no objections to nuclear energy," Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Con solo dieciocho medallas disponibles por día, son varios los países que no han logrado llegar al podio de las medallas. Están incluidos los Países Bajos, con Anna Jochemsen, quien ayer obtuvo la novena plaza en la categoría femenina en el Super-G, y Finlandia, con Katjia Saarinen en el décimo lugar en el mismo evento. Mitchell Gourley, de Australia, obtuvo el undécimo puesto en la categoría masculina de pie del slalom súper gigante. El competidor checo, Oldrich Jelinek, terminó decimosexto en el grupo masculino de sentados. Arly Velásquez, de México, obtuvo la posición número quince en el Super-G masculino sentado. Adam Hall, de Nueva Zelanda, finalizó en el puesto nueve en la categoría Super-G masculina. El esquiador del grupo masculino con discapacidad visual, Maciej Krezel, y su guía, Anna Ogarzynska, de Polonia, terminaron en el decimotercer lugar en el Super-G. Jong Seork Park de Corea del Sur obtuvo el vigésimo cuarto puesto en el grupo masculino sentados.
mt: With only eighteen medals available per day, several countries have yet to reach the podium for medals. The Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen, who yesterday placed ninth in the women's Super-G, and Finland, with Katjia Saarinen in tenth place in the same event, are among them. Mitchell Gourley, of Australia, placed eleventh in the men's standing slalom super giant. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting group. Arly Velásquez, of Mexico, placed fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Adam Hall, of New Zealand, finished ninth in the men's sitting Super-G. The visually impaired male skier, Maciej Krezel, and his guide, Anna Ogarzynska, of Poland, finished thirteenth in the Super-G. Jong Seork Park of South Korea placed twenty-fourth in the men's sitting group.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: El juicio tuvo lugar en la Corte de la Corona de Birmingham y finalizó el 3 de agosto. El presentador, a quien se arrestó en el lugar, negó la agresión y sostuvo que empleó el palo como protección contra las botellas que hasta unas treinta personas le lanzaban. Se condenó a Blake por intento de obstrucción de justicia. El juez le manifestó a Blake que era «prácticamente inevitable» que lo enviaran a prisión.
mt: The trial took place in the Crown Court in Birmingham and ended on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the assault and claimed he used the stick as protection against the bottles that up to thirty people were throwing at him. Blake was convicted of attempting to obstruct justice. The judge told Blake that it was "virtually inevitable" that he would be sent to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Otros temas incluidos en la agenda en Bali son salvar los bosques que subsisten en el planeta y compartir tecnologías para contribuir a que las naciones en vías de desarrollo crezcan de forma menos contaminante. La ONU tiene la intención de completar un fondo de asistencia en favor de los países víctima de los efectos del calentamiento global, a fin de poder enfrentar su impacto. Se podrían destinar los fondos a hogares no inundables, una mejor administración del agua y a la diversificación de los cultivos.
mt: Other topics on the agenda in Bali include saving the forests that remain on the planet and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow less polluting. The UN plans to complete an assistance fund for countries affected by the effects of global warming, in order to be able to face its impact. The funds could be used for non-flooded homes, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Otros temas incluidos en la agenda en Bali son salvar los bosques que subsisten en el planeta y compartir tecnologías para contribuir a que las naciones en vías de desarrollo crezcan de forma menos contaminante. La ONU tiene la intención de completar un fondo de asistencia en favor de los países víctima de los efectos del calentamiento global, a fin de poder enfrentar su impacto. Se podrían destinar los fondos a hogares no inundables, una mejor administración del agua y a la diversificación de los cultivos.
mt: Other topics on the agenda in Bali include saving the forests that remain on the planet and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow less polluting. The UN plans to complete an assistance fund for countries affected by the effects of global warming, in order to be able to face its impact. The funds could be used for non-flooded homes, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: La semana anterior a la cumbre, Nigeria había anunciado su intención de adherirse al Acuerdo de Libre Comercio Africano. La adhesión de Benin fue anunciada por el comisario de Comercio e Industria de la Unión Africana (UA), Albert Muchanga. El comisario expresó: «Si bien todavía no hemos definido las reglas de origen ni las condiciones arancelarias, el marco con el que contamos es suficiente para dar inicio a las transacciones desde el 1 de julio de 2020».
mt: The week before the summit, Nigeria had announced its intention to join the African Free Trade Agreement. Benin's accession was announced by the Commissioner for Trade and Industry of the African Union (AU), Albert Muchanga. The commissioner said: "While we have not yet defined the rules of origin or the tariff conditions, the framework we have is sufficient to start transactions from July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Recibió contundentes elogios durante su estadía en Atlanta y ganó reconocimiento por su educación urbana innovadora. Fue nombrado Superintendente Nacional del Año en 2009. Al momento de su nombramiento, las escuelas de Atlanta habían demostrado una importante mejora en las calificaciones de exámenes. Al poco tiempo, se hizo una publicación en el Atlanta Journal-Constitution que contenía un informe en el que se señalaban los problemas de los resultados de los exámenes. Según mostró el informe, las calificaciones de los exámenes habían subido escandalosamente rápido y afirmaba que el establecimiento educativo había detectado problemas internamente, pero que no tomó ninguna medida al respecto. De allí en adelante, la evidencia demostró que los exámenes habían sido falsificados. En 2013, Hall y otros 34 funcionarios educativos fueron acusados.
mt: He received strong praise during his stay in Atlanta and won recognition for his innovative urban education. He was named National Superintendent of the Year in 2009. At the time of his appointment, Atlanta's schools had shown significant improvement in test scores. Shortly thereafter, an article in the Atlanta Journal-Constitution contained a report that highlighted problems with test results. According to the report, test scores had risen scandalously quickly and claimed that the educational establishment had detected internal problems, but did not take any action. From there on, evidence showed that the tests had been falsified. In 2013, Hall and other 34 education officials were charged.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Una bomba fue detonada en la puerta de la oficina del gobernador general. Otras tres bombas fueron detonadas en las inmediaciones de establecimientos gubernamentales en un tramo de dos horas. Si bien existen informes que señalan que el número oficial de muertos es ocho y las autoridades han confirmado que cerca de 30 personas resultaron herida, aún se desconocen las cifras oficiales.
mt: A bomb was detonated at the gate of the governor general's office. Three other bombs were detonated in the vicinity of government buildings over a two-hour period. While there are reports that the official death toll is eight and authorities have confirmed that nearly 30 people were injured, official figures are still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: En enero de 2017 y con 21 años de edad, Jesús, proveniente del club brasileño Palmeiras, pasó a formar parte del Manchester City, por un salario declarado de 27 millones de libras esterlinas. Desde entonces, el brasileño ha jugado para el equipo en 53 enfrentamientos, en todos los campeonatos, y ha convertido 24 veces.
mt: In January 2017, at the age of 21, Jesus, from Brazilian club Palmeiras, joined Manchester City for a reported salary of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in 53 matches for the team in all competitions, scoring 24 times.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Un albergue colapsó hoy en La Meca, tierra sagrada del islam, cerca de las 10:00 a. m., hora local. El albergue hospedaba a varios devotos que habían llegado a la ciudad sagrada las vísperas de la peregrinación del Hajj. El albergue eestaba ocupado en su mayor parte por huéspedes provenientes de los Emiratos Árabes Unidos. La cantidad de decesos asciende a, al menos, 15 personas, cifra que se estima irá en aumento.
mt: A hostel collapsed today in Mecca, holy land of Islam, at around 10:00 am local time. The hostel housed several devotees who had arrived in the holy city the night before the Hajj pilgrimage. The hostel was mostly occupied by guests from the United Arab Emirates. The death toll stands at, at least, 15 people, a figure that is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Los satélites, cuyo peso superaba las 1000 libras y que se desplazaban a cerca de 17 500 millas por hora, colisionaron a 491 millas por encima de la Tierra. Según los expertos, la explosión que generó la colisión fue masiva. Aún intentan establecer cuán importante fue el impacto y de qué modo afectará al planeta. El Comando Estratégico de EE. UU., que depende de la oficina del Departamento de Defensa, realiza un rastreo de los restos. El resultado del análisis de rastreo se dará a conocer en un sitio web de acceso libre.
mt: The satellites, which weighed over 450 kilograms and were traveling at about 28,000 kilometers per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. According to experts, the explosion generated by the collision was massive. They are still trying to establish how significant the impact was and how it will affect the planet. The U.S. Strategic Command, which is part of the Department of Defense, is tracking the debris. The results of the tracking analysis will be posted on a publicly accessible website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten alcanzó la posición 190 dentro del listado de los 400 norteamericanos más acaudalados de 2008, con una fortuna que se estima en $2300 millones de dólares. Obtuvo su diploma en 1950, en la Facultad de Artes y Ciencias de la Universidad de Virginia. También realizó grandes contribuciones en su favor.
mt: Batten reached position 190 in the list of the 400 richest Americans in 2008, with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He received his degree in 1950, from the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Virginia. He also made large contributions in his favor.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Una propuesta de ley fue dictada por el gobernador de California, Arnold Schwarzenegger, que no permite vender o rentar videojuegos violentos a menores de edad. El proyecto de ley dispone que los videojuegos violentos que se vendan en el estado de California deben etiquetarse con una calcomanía con la leyenda «18» y penaliza su venta a menores de edad con una multa de $1000 por incumplimiento.
mt: A bill was proposed by California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger that prohibits the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled with a sticker with the legend "18" and fines violators $1000 for noncompliance.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall, que está casado y tiene dos hijos adultos, no causó una buena impresión a Miller, que fue a quien le relató la historia. Al pedirle un comentario, Miller dijo: «Mike habla mucho durante la audiencia… Estaba preparándome, así que en verdad no pude escuchar lo que decía».
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a good impression on Miller, who was the one to whom he recounted the story. When asked for a comment, Miller said: "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was getting ready, so I really couldn't hear what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Stephen Harper, primer ministro, acordó enviar la Ley de Aire Limpio del gobierno para su revisión a un comité donde participan todos los partidos antes de la segunda lectura, y después de la reunión de 25 minutos en la PMO del martes con Jack Layton, líder del NDP. Durante la reunión llevada a cabo con el primer ministro, Layton había solicitado que se introdujeran cambios en la ley ambiental de los conservadores, apelando a una «modificación exhaustiva y completa de su redacción». Desde que el gobierno federal intervino y asumió la financiación del hospital Mersey, en Davenport, Tasmania, las autoridades estatales y algunos miembros del parlamento federal tacharon tal medida de engañosa, con miras en las elecciones federales, que tendrán lugar en el mes de noviembre. Sin embargo, el primer ministro John Howard afirmó que el único objetivo de la ley fue proteger las instalaciones del hospital de la degradación por parte del gobierno de Tasmania, al otorgar 45 millones de dólares australianos adicionales.
mt: Stephen Harper, prime minister, agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to a committee where all parties participate before second reading, and after the 25-minute PMO meeting on Tuesday with Jack Layton, NDP leader. During the meeting held with the prime minister, Layton had requested that changes be made to the Conservative's environmental law, appealing to a "thorough and complete revision of its wording". Since the federal government intervened and took over the funding of the Mersey Hospital, in Davenport, Tasmania, state authorities and some federal parliament members called such a measure deceptive, with an eye to federal elections, which will take place in November. However, Prime Minister John Howard said the only goal of the law was to protect the hospital's facilities from degradation by the government of Tasmania, by giving an additional 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Se encontraron concentraciones de ácido cianúrico y melamina en las muestras de orina analizadas de animales que murieron tras ingerir comida para mascotas contaminada. Los investigadores indicaron que los dos compuestos reaccionan entre sí para dar lugar a cristales que pueden obstruir la función renal. Los especialistas detectaron la formación de cristales en el orín de los felinos, por la incorporación de melamina y ácido cianúrico. Al ser comparados a través del uso de la espectroscopia infrarroja (FTIR), pudo determinarse que la composición de los cristales coincide con la encontrada en la orina de las mascotas afectadas.
mt: Concentrations of cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine samples analyzed from animals that died after eating contaminated pet food. The researchers indicated that the two compounds react with each other to form crystals that can block kidney function. Specialists detected the formation of crystals in the urine of cats, by the incorporation of melamine and cyanuric acid. When compared using infrared spectroscopy (FTIR), it was determined that the composition of the crystals matches that found in the urine of affected pets.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Xinhua informó que el miércoles los investigadores del gobierno lograron recuperar los registradores de vuelo de la caja negra. Los luchadores compañeros de Luna también le rindieron homenaje. Tommy Dreamer manifestó: «Luna fue la primera reina del Extremo. Falleció la noche de las dos lunas, algo único, como ella. Una mujer fuerte». Dustin Oro en Polvo Runnels declaró: «Luna era tan rara como yo; hasta, incluso, más. La amo y la extrañaré. Espero que se encuentre en un lugar mejor».
mt: Xinhua reported that on Wednesday government investigators recovered the flight recorders from the black box. Luna's fellow wrestlers also paid tribute. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first queen of Extreme. She died on the night of the two moons, something unique, like her. A strong woman." Dustin Rhodes said, "Luna was as weird as I am; even more so. I love her and will miss her. I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: A pesar de que había tres personas en el interior de la vivienda en el momento del impacto del automóvil, ninguna de ellas sufrió lesiones. No obstante, el conductor sufrió lesiones graves en su cabeza. La carretera donde se produjo el accidente fue cerrada temporalmente mientras los servicios de emergencia sacaban de su interior al conductor del Audi TT rojo. En un principio, se lo trasladó al Hospital James Paget de Great Yarmouth. Luego lo trasladaron al Hospital Addenbrooke, en Cambridge.
mt: Despite there being three people in the house at the time of the car impact, none of them were injured. However, the driver suffered serious head injuries. The road where the accident occurred was temporarily closed while emergency services extracted the driver of the red Audi TT. Initially, he was taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: El inicio de los juegos fue a las 10:00 a. m., acompañados de un buen clima, y, excepto por una leve lluvia a media mañana que pronto se disipó, fue una jornada ideal para el rugby 7. Sudáfrica, mejor cabeza de serie del torneo, comenzó bien al obtener un holgado triunfo por 26-0 contra Zambia, quien se encuentra en quinto lugar. Aunque se mostraron apagadas contra sus hermanas sureñas, Sudáfrica mejoró a medida que avanzó el torneo. Su defensa disciplinada, sus habilidades de manejo del balón y el excelente trabajo en equipo los llevaron a destacarse y quedó claro que este era el equipo a derrotar.
mt: The games began at 10:00 a.m., accompanied by good weather, and, except for a light rain at mid-morning that soon dissipated, it was an ideal day for rugby 7. South Africa, the top-seeded team in the tournament, started well by winning by a comfortable 26-0 margin against Zambia, who are in fifth place. Although they were subdued against their southern sisters, South Africa improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball-handling skills, and excellent teamwork made them stand out, and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: En las últimas tres décadas, China ha desarrollado una economía de mercado, aun cuando, oficialmente, continúa teniendo un régimen comunista. Bajo el mando de Deng Xiaoping se introdujeron las primeras reformas económicas. A partir de allí, el volumen económico de China ha crecido 90 veces más. La exportación de automóviles de China superó, por primera vez, a la de Alemania y sobrepasó a EE. UU. como el mercado más importante de esta industria. En veinte años, el PIB de China podría ser más alto que el de los Estados Unidos.
mt: In the last three decades, China has developed a market economy, even though, officially, it continues to have a communist regime. Under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping, the first economic reforms were introduced. Since then, China's economic volume has grown 90 times. China's automobile exports surpassed Germany for the first time, and surpassed the United States as the most important market for this industry. In twenty years, China's GDP could be higher than that of the United States.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
