src: Según Ansa, «la policía estaba preocupada por unos asaltos de máximo riesgo que temían pudieran desencadenar en verdadera una secuencia de guerra. La policía expresó que Lo Piccolo corría con ventaja, ya que había sido el hombre de confianza de Provenzano en Palermo y su gran experiencia le permitió ganar el respeto de la generación previa de jefes ya que éstos seguían la política de Provenzano de mantener un perfil tan bajo como fuera posible mientras que fortalecían su red de poder. Provenzano ya había controlado a estos jefes para cuando terminó con la guerra promovida por Riina contra el estado, la que tuvo como saldo la muerte, en 1922, de Giovanni Falcone y Paolo Borsellino, dos luchadores en contra la mafia».
mt: According to Ansa, "the police were concerned about a series of maximum risk attacks they feared could trigger a real sequence of war. The police expressed that Lo Piccolo had an advantage, as he had been the right-hand man of Provenzano in Palermo and his great experience allowed him to gain the respect of the previous generation of bosses as they followed Provenzano's policy of keeping as low a profile as possible while strengthening their power network. Provenzano had already controlled these bosses by the time he ended the war promoted by Riina against the state, which had as a result the death in 1992 of Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino, two fighters against the mafia."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: El yudoca oriundo de Japón, Hitoshi Saito, portador de dos medallas olímpicas de oro, falleció a los 54 años. Se comunicó que la causa del deceso fue cáncer de conductos biliares intrahepáticos. Su deceso ocurrió el martes, en Osaka. A la fecha de su deceso, aparte de haber sido medallista olímpico y mundial, Saito era director del comité de entrenamiento de la Federación de Judo japonesa.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, an Olympic gold medalist, died. It was reported that the cause of death was intrahepatic bile duct cancer. His death occurred on Tuesday in Osaka. At the time of his death, in addition to being an Olympic and world medalist, Saito was the director of the training committee of the Japanese Judo Federation.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Iwasaki debió enfrentarse con numerosos problemas durante su viaje. Lo asaltaron piratas, lo mordió un perro con rabia en el Tíbet, escapó del matrimonio en Nepal y lo detuvo la policía en India.
mt: Iwasaki had to face numerous problems during his journey. He was attacked by pirates, bitten by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested by police in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella no logró mantener el control del vehículo y abandonó la carrera poco después de inciarse. Fernando Alonso, su compañero de equipo, tuvo la delantera durante la mayor parte de la carrera, pero debió ponerle fin justo después de su parada técnica, de seguro debido a que su rueda derecha estaba seriamente doblada. Michael Schumacher abandonó la carrera no mucho después de Alonso, a causa de una avería en la suspensión, producto de las numerosas batallas durante la carrera.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of the car and retired shortly after the start. Fernando Alonso, his teammate, had the lead for most of the race, but had to retire just after his pit stop, surely because his right rear wheel was seriously bent. Michael Schumacher retired not long after Alonso, due to a suspension failure, caused by the numerous battles during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: En los últimos tres meses, se liberaron más de 80 detenidos de la Reserva Central sin una acusación formal. En abril de este año, el juez Glynn firmó una orden de protección contra la prisión para obligarla efectivizar la liberación de quienes fueran detenidos por más de 24 horas desde su ingreso sin que un comisionado de la corte los oyera en una audiencia. El comisionado fija el monto de la fianza, si se la aprueba, y formaliza los cargos presentados por el oficial que procedió a su detención. Los mismos se ingresan, a continuación, en el sistema informático del estado, a través del cual se hace el seguimiento del caso. En la audiencia también se fija la fecha en la que el sospechoso podrá ejercer su derecho de solicitar un juicio rápido.
mt: In the last three months, more than 80 detainees were released from the Central Reservoir without formal charges. In April of this year, Judge Glynn signed an order of protection against the prison to force it to release those who had been detained for more than 24 hours since their entry without a court commissioner hearing them in a hearing. The commissioner sets the amount of bail, if approved, and formalizes the charges brought by the officer who proceeded to his arrest. The same are entered, then, into the state's computer system, through which the case is tracked. In the hearing, the date is also set on which the suspect can exercise his right to request a speedy trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin también comentó que los funcionarios optaron por cancelar la segunda vuelta para que los afganos ahorraran el costo y el riesgo de seguridad de una nueva ronda. Los diplomáticos manifestaron haber hallado suficiente ambigüedad en el texto constitucional afgano para decidir que la segunda vuelta no era necesaria. Esto se contrapone con los informes previos, que indicaban que la cancelación de la segunda vuelta habría sido inconstitucional.
mt: Lodin also commented that officials opted to cancel the second round so Afghans would save the cost and risk of security of a new round. Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to decide that a second round was not necessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which indicated that canceling the second round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Desde la independencia pakistaní del control británico en 1947, su presidente ha nombrado «agentes políticos» para gobernar las áreas tribales bajo administración federal, que ejercen un control autónomo casi total sobre estas zonas. Estos funcionarios tienen el deber de proveer servicios gubernamentales y judiciales a tenor de lo dispuesto por el artículo 247 de la Constitución paquistaní.
mt: Since Pakistan's independence from British control in 1947, its president has appointed "political agents" to govern the tribal areas under federal administration, which exercise almost total autonomous control over these regions. These officials have the duty to provide government and judicial services in accordance with Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

Estos funcionarios tienen el deber de proveer servicios gubernamentales y judiciales a tenor de lo dispuesto por el artículo 247 de la Constitución paquistaní.

These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: El filme, protagonizado por Tyan Gosling y Emma Stone, fue nominado en todas las categorías más importantes. Gosling y Stone fueron nominados como Mejor Actor y Mejor Actriz, respectivamente. Entre las demás nominaciones se encuentran Mejor película, Mejor director, Mejor cinematografía, Mejor diseño de vestuario, Mejor edición de películas, Mejor partitura original, Mejor diseño de producción, Mejor edición de sonido, Mejor mezcla de sonido y Mejor guion original. Fueron dos las nominadas a mejor canción original: Audición (Los tontos que sueñan) y Ciudad de estrellas. El estudio Lionsgate fue nominado 26 veces, superando a cualquier otro estudio.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress, respectively. Among the other nominations were Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay. Two songs were nominated for Best Original Song: "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars". The studio Lionsgate was nominated 26 times, surpassing any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Además, NHK indicó que la central nuclear de Kashiwazaki-Kariwa, en la prefectura de Niigata, estaba operando con normalidad. Hokuriku Electric Power Co declaró que el terremoto no ocasionó incidencias y que se cerraron los reactores 1 y 2 de su planta nuclear de Shika. Se informó que alrededor de 9400 viviendas de la región se encuentran si suministro de agua y unas 100 sin electricidad. Algunas rutas fueron dañadas, el servicio de trenes se vio interrumpido en las zonas afectadas, y el aeropuerto de Noto, en la prefectura de Ishikawa, permanece cerrado.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki-Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co said the earthquake did not cause any problems and that it shut down reactors 1 and 2 at its Shika nuclear plant. It was reported that about 9,400 homes in the region were without water and about 100 were without electricity. Some roads were damaged, train service was disrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remains closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Según la información que se filtró, el documento tratará sobre el conflicto fronterizo, que Palestina pretende resolver basándose en los límites vigentes en forma previa a la Guerra del Medio Oriente de 1967. Otros tópicos que también se abordaron, según fuera informado, incluyen el futuro estado de Jerusalén, que ambas naciones consideran sagrado, y el problema del Valle del Jordán. Israel exige una presencia militar constante en el valle por diez años una vez que se firme el acuerdo, mientras que PA solo acepta cinco.
mt: According to leaked information, the document will deal with the border dispute, which Palestine intends to resolve based on the pre-1967 War of the Middle East boundaries. Other topics that were also addressed, according to the information, include the future state of Jerusalem, which both nations consider sacred, and the problem of the Jordan Valley. Israel demands a constant military presence in the valley for ten years once the agreement is signed, while PA only accepts five.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Ma, oriunda de Hong Kong, se formó en la Universidad de Nueva York y en la Escuela de Leyes de Harvard y alguna vez contó con una «tarjeta verde» de residente permanente en los Estados Unidos. Durante las elecciones, Hsieh insinuó que Ma podría escapar del país en tiempos de crisis. Hsieh también manifestó que el agraciado Ma era más apariencia que contenido. Ma logró una cómoda victoria, pese a estas acusaciones, en una plataforma partidaria de establecer relaciones más estrechas con la China continental.
mt: Ma, from Hong Kong, was educated at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held a "green card" as a permanent resident of the United States. During the election, Hsieh hinted that Ma might flee the country in times of crisis. Hsieh also said the favored Ma was more appearance than substance. Ma won a comfortable victory, despite these accusations, on a party platform of establishing closer ties with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Luego de que cobró notoriedad el hecho de que numerosas familias recurrieron a asesoramiento legal contra los desalojos, el 20 de marzo se realizó una reunión en el Centro Legal de la Comunidad de East Bay con las víctimas de la estafa en torno a las viviendas. Cuando los inquilinos comenzaron a contarse lo que les había pasado, las familias afectadas de pronto se dieron cuenta de que Carolyn Wilson, de la OHA, había tomado los depósitos de seguridad y huido de la ciudad. Los inquilinos de Lockwood Gardens estiman que podría haber otras 40 familias, o quizás más, que enfrentan el desalojo, dado que tomaron conocimiento de que la fuerza policial de la OHA conduce también una investigación en otras propiedades de vivienda pública en Oakland, que podrían estar afectadas por estafas habitacionales.
mt: After the fact that numerous families had sought legal advice against evictions became widely known, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center on March 20 with the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants began to tell what had happened to them, the affected families suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson, of the OHA, had taken the security deposits and fled the city. The tenants of Lockwood Gardens estimate that there could be as many as 40 families, or more, facing eviction, since they learned that the OHA police force is also conducting an investigation into other public housing properties in Oakland, which could be affected by housing scams.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Después de la carrera, el Campeonato de Pilotos continúa liderado por Keselowski, con un puntaje de 2250. Johnson está en la segunda posición con 2243 puntos, siete puntos abajo. Hamlin ocupa la posición número tres con veinte puntos menos, pero con cinco más que Bowyer. Kahne y Truex, Jr. están en quinto y sexto lugar con una puntuación de 2220 y 2207, respectivamente. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick completan los diez primeros puestos del Campeonato de Pilotos, en una temporada que todavía cuenta con cuatro carreras más por delante.
mt: After the race, the Drivers' Championship continues to be led by Keselowski, with a score of 2250. Johnson is in second place with 2243 points, seven points behind. Hamlin occupies the third position with twenty points less, but with five more than Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are in fifth and sixth place with a score of 2220 and 2207, respectively. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick complete the top ten in the Drivers' Championship, with four races still to go.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Se cree que esta es la quinta oportunidad en la historia en que las personas han podido ver la caída sobre la Tierra de lo que fue químicamente confirmado como material marciano. De los cerca de 24 000 meteoritos que se sabe han impactado sobre la Tierra, se ha corroborado que tan solo 34 son de provienen de Marte. Se adjudicaron quince de estas rocas a la lluvia de meteoritos ocurrida en julio pasado. Algunas de las rocas, muy poco comunes en la Tierra, se venden entre $11 000 y $22 500 dólares por onza, que representa aproximadamente diez veces el precio del oro.
mt: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have been able to see a piece of Mars fall to Earth, chemically confirmed as Martian material. Of the approximately 24,000 meteorites known to have impacted Earth, only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of these rocks were attributed to the meteor shower that occurred last July. Some of the rocks, very rare on Earth, sell for between $11,000 and $22,500 dollars per ounce, which is approximately ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

Algunas de las rocas, muy poco comunes en la Tierra, se venden entre $11 000 y $22 500 dólares por onza, que representa aproximadamente diez veces el precio del oro.
mt: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have been able to see a piece of Mars fall to Earth, chemically confirmed as Martian material. Of the approximately 24,000 meteorites known to have impacted Earth, only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of these rocks were attributed to the meteor shower that occurred last July. Some of the rocks, very rare on Earth, sell for between $11,000 and $22,500 dollars per ounce, which is approximately ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, quien se alejó de las pistas en 2006 después de ser siete veces campeón del Fórmula 1, debía ir en reemplazo de Felipe Massa, debido a su lesión. En 2009, brasileño sufrió un traumatismo agudo en su cabeza en una colisión durante el Gran Premio de Hungría. Massa debe estar fuera durante al menos lo que resta de la temporada 2009.
mt: Schumacher, who left the tracks in 2006 after being seven times Formula 1 champion, was supposed to replace Felipe Massa, due to his injury. In 2009, Brazilian suffered a severe head trauma in a collision during the Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa must be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Hasta el momento, AOL ha logrado desarrollar y manejar el mercado de mensajería instantánea a conveniencia, gracias a su uso generalizado en EE. UU. Cuando esto se haya establecido, podría terminar la libertad. La cantidad de usuarios de Yahoo! y las prestaciones de Microsoft, unidos, se enfrentarán con el volumen de clientes de AOL.
mt: Until now, AOL has been able to develop and manage the instant messaging market at will, thanks to its widespread use in the U.S. When this is established, it could end freedom. The number of Yahoo! users and Microsoft's features, combined, will face the volume of AOL's customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: En la mañana de ayer, en Gaziantep, Turquía, un coche bomba mató a dos oficiales de policía e hirió a más de otras veinte personas. Desde el gobierno informaron que diecinueve de las personas heridas eran policías. La policía informó que el sospechoso por el ataque es un supuesto militante de Daish (ELIL).
mt: Yesterday morning, in Gaziantep, Turkey, a car bomb killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others. The government reported that nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police reported that the suspect in the attack is a suspected Daish (ISIL) militant.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: El martes, alcanzando más del 46 % de los sufragios, el ex gobernador de Massachusetts, Mitt Romney, triunfó en las elecciones primarias para presidente del Partido Republicano de Florida. Newt Gingrich, ex presidente de la Cámara de Representantes de EE. UU., obtuvo el segundo puesto, alcanzando el 32 % de los votos. Al ser un estado en que el ganador recibe todo, Florida asignó sus cincuenta delegados a Rommey, lo que lo impulsó como principal candidato para la nominación del Partido Republicano.
mt: On Tuesday, reaching more than 46% of the votes, former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary. Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, came in second, reaching 32% of the votes. As a winner-take-all state, Florida assigned its fifty delegates to Romney, propelling him as the leading candidate for the Republican Party's nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: El ex primer mandatario de la Cámara de Representantes, Newt Gingrich, el gobernador de Texas, Rick Perry y Michele Bachmann, miembro del congreso, ocuparon la cuarta, quinta y sexta posición, respectivamente. Después de que los resultados llegaron, Gingrich elogió a Santorum, pero lanzó duras palabras contra Rommey, en cuya representación se difundieron anuncios de campaña negativos contra Gingrich en Iowa. Perry sostuvo que: «Volvería a Texas a evaluar los resultados de la reunión electoral de hoy y determinar si hay un camino que debo seguir». Luego dijo que permanecería en carrera y que competiría en las elecciones primarias del 21 de enero, en Carolina del Sur». Bachmann, quien resultó triunfante en la Straw Poll de Ames en agosto, decidió dar fin a su campaña.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann took fourth, fifth and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich praised Santorum, but launched harsh words against Romney, whose campaign released negative ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas to evaluate the results of today's caucus and determine if there is a path forward for me." He then said he would stay in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: El sitio web de la estación describe al programa como «un radioteatro de la vieja escuela ¡con un giro inteligente, nuevo y ofensivo!». En sus inicios, el programa se emitía solo en el sitio de radio por internet, TogiNet Radio, un espacio de larga data enfocado en el formato de radio hablada. A fines de 2015, TogiNet instaló la estación AstroNet Radio como una filial. Originalmente, el programa contó con actores de doblaje aficionados, locales del este de Tejas.
mt: The station's website describes the program as "a vintage radio play with a smart, new, and offensive twist!" In its early days, the program was only broadcast on the internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a long-running space focused on spoken word radio. At the end of 2015, TogiNet installed the AstroNet Radio station as a subsidiary. Originally, the program featured amateur voice actors, locals of East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Los terroristas de Mumbai arribaron en una embarcación el 26 de noviembre de 2008, munidos con granadas y armas automáticas, y atacaron numerosos objetivos, como la concurrida estación ferroviaria Chhatrapati Schivaji y el popular Hotel Taj Mahal. El estudio de campo y la recolección de datos hechos por David Headley facilitó el ataque perpetrado por los 10 hombres armados de la facción militante paquistaní Ejército de los Puros. El ataque sometió a una intensa presión a los vínculos entre India y Pakistán.
mt: 26 November 2008, the terrorists arrived by boat, armed with grenades and automatic weapons, and attacked numerous targets, including the busy Chhatrapati Shivaji railway station and the popular Taj Mahal Hotel. The field study and data collection done by David Headley facilitated the attack carried out by the 10 armed men of the Pakistani militant group Army of the Pure. The attack put intense pressure on the ties between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: El récord mano a mano de Nadal contra el canadiense fue de 7-2. Fue derrotado, hace poco, por Raonic en el Brisbane Open. En el partido, Nadal acumuló un 88% de puntos netos y ganó 76 en el primer servicio. Después del partido, el Rey del Polvo declaró: «Estoy emocionado de estar otra vez en las rondas finales de los torneos más importantes. He venido aquí para tratar de ganar».
mt: Nadal's head-to-head record against the Canadian was 7-2. He was recently defeated by Raonic at the Brisbane Open. In the match, Nadal accumulated an 88% of net points and won 76 on the first serve. After the match, the King of Clay declared: "I'm excited to be back in the finals of the most important tournaments. I came here to try to win".
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: La semana pasada, Naked News (Noticias al desnudo) hizo saber públicamente que elevaría radicalmente su mandato de idioma internacional para comunicar noticias, a cuyo fin incorporará tres nuevas transmisiones. Esta organización global, que ya da las noticias en inglés y en japonés, está activando programas en español, italiano y coreano para la televisión, internet y dispositivos móviles.
mt: Last week, Naked News (Noticias al desnudo) announced publicly that it would radically increase its mandate of international language to communicate news, to which end it will incorporate three new transmissions. This global organization, which already gives the news in English and Japanese, is activating programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the Internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Carpanedo participó en dos carreras individuales del campeonato aparte de la competencia del miércoles. El primero fue el slalom, en el que obtuvo un «No Terminó la primera carrera», al igual que 36 de los 116 participantes de esa carrera. En su otra carrera, el eslalon gigante, obtuvo el décimo lugar en el grupo femenino de sentadas con un tiempo de ejecución combinado de 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutos por detrás de la primera finalista austríaca, Claudia Loesch, y 1:09.02 minutos por debajo del noveno finalista, Gyöngyi Dani, de Hungría. Cuatro esquiadoras de la categoría sentadas no lograron completar sus carreras y un total de 45 participantes de 117 del Slalom Gigante no alcanzaron la clasificación en la carrera.
mt: Carpanedo participated in two individual races apart from the Wednesday competition. The first was the slalom, in which he obtained a "Did not finish the first race", as did 36 of the 116 participants in that race. In his other race, the giant slalom, he obtained tenth place in the female sitting group with a combined time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes behind the first Austrian finisher, Claudia Loesch, and 1:09.02 minutes behind the ninth finisher, Gyöngyi Dani, of Hungary. Four skiers in the sitting category did not complete their races and a total of 45 participants of 117 in the Giant Slalom did not qualify for the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: El miércoles, la Asociación Nacional de Baloncesto de los EE. UU. (NBA) interrumpió su temporada profesional a causa de las preocupaciones en relación al coronavirus. La NBA tomó la decisión tras el resultado positivo de un jugador de Utah Jazz para el virus COVID-19.
mt: On Wednesday, the United States National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional season due to concerns over the coronavirus. The NBA made the decision after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: El miércoles, la Asociación Nacional de Baloncesto de los EE. UU. (NBA) interrumpió su temporada profesional a causa de las preocupaciones en relación al coronavirus. La NBA tomó la decisión tras el resultado positivo de un jugador de Utah Jazz para el virus COVID-19.
mt: On Wednesday, the United States National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional season due to concerns over the coronavirus. The NBA made the decision after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Alex Ovechkin, de Washington Capitals, es el deportista estrella del día de la fecha. Marcó 2 goles y 2 asistencias en el triunfo por 5 a 3 de Washington sobre los Thrashers de Atlanta. Ovechkin hizo su primera asistencia de la noche con el gol del triunfo del novato Nicklas Backstrom; Su segunda anotación de la noche fue su número 60 en la temporada, convirtiéndose en el primer jugador en hacer esa cantidad o más en una misma temporada desde 1995- 96, cuando tanto Jaromir Jagr como Mario Lemieux lograron ese récord.
mt: Alex Ovechkin, of the Washington Capitals, is the athlete of the day. He scored two goals and two assists in the 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin made his first assist of the night with the game-winning goal of rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score that many or more in a single season since 1995-96, when both Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished that record.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

mt: Alex Ovechkin, of the Washington Capitals, is the athlete of the day. He scored two goals and two assists in the 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin made his first assist of the night with the game-winning goal of rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score that many or more in a single season since 1995-96, when both Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished that record.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: La nacionalización del banco Northern Rock se produjo en 2008, luego de que se diera a conocer que el gobierno del Reino Unido le había dado a la compañía un apoyo de emergencia. Como consecuencia de su exposición durante la crisis de las hipotecas de alto riesgo en 2007, había sido necesario para Northern Rock obtener respaldo económico. Antes de su nacionalización, se rechazó una oferta que el Virgin Group de Sir Richard Branson había hecho por el banco. En 2010, cuando ya había sido nacionalizado, el hoy en día banco principal, Northern Rock plc, se separó del «banco malo», Northern Rock (Gestión de Activos). Virgin no ha adquirido la empresa de gestión de activos, sino únicamente el «buen banco» de Northern Rock.
mt: The nationalisation of Northern Rock occurred in 2008, after the British government had given the company emergency support. As a result of its exposure during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis, it had been necessary for Northern Rock to obtain financial support. Before its nationalisation, a bid by Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had been rejected. In 2010, when already nationalised, the main bank, Northern Rock plc, was separated from the "bad bank", Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin did not acquire the asset management company, but only the "good bank" of Northern Rock.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: La decisión del Sr. Rudd de suscribir el acuerdo climático de Kyoto deja solo a Estados Unidos, que pasará a ser la única nación desarrollada que no ratificó el acuerdo. El anterior gobierno conservador de Australia se rehusó a ratificar el Protocolo de Kioto, alegando que sería perjudicial para la economía con su marcada dependencia de las exportaciones de carbón, al tiempo que países como India o China no quedaban compelidos a cumplir con objetivos de emisiones.
mt: The decision by Mr Rudd to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement leaves only the United States as the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. The previous conservative Australian government refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol, arguing that it would be detrimental to the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries such as India or China were not compelled to meet emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Durante el ensayo complementario de control de plagas, los guardabosques debían supervisar de cerca a los tiradores, dado que éste se monitoreaba y se evaluaba su efectividad. En una unión entre NPWS y la Asociación de Tiradores Deportivos de Australia (NSW) Inc., se reclutaron voluntarios idóneos dentro del programa de caza de la Asociación de Tiradores Deportivos. Mick O'Flynn, quien se encuentra a cargo, provisoriamente, de la oficina de Conservación y Patrimonio del Parque del NPWS, señaló que se brindó una capacitación integral en seguridad y entrenamiento a los cuatro tiradores escogidos para la operación de tiro.
mt: During the supplementary pest control trial, rangers were to closely monitor shooters, as this was being monitored and evaluated for effectiveness. In a joint NPWS and NSW Sporting Shooters Association (SSA) Inc. recruitment drive, suitable volunteers were recruited into the SSA's pest control program. Mick O'Flynn, who is temporarily in charge of the NPWS Conservation and Heritage Park Office, noted that a comprehensive safety and training course was provided to the four shooters selected for the shooting operation.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Basándose en este fósil, puede concluirse que la división ocurrió mucho antes de lo que indica la evidencia molecular. «Esto quiere decir que todo debe llevarse hacia atrás», indicó Berhance Asfaw, investigador para el Servicio de Investigación del Valle del Rift en Etiopía y coautor del estudio.
mt: Based on this fossil, it can be concluded that the split occurred much earlier than molecular evidence indicates. "This means everything has to be pushed back," said Berhance Asfaw, an investigator for the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: El jueves, en la presentación inaugural del Tokyo Game Show, Satoru Iwata, presidente de Nintento, dio a conocer el diseño del controlador para la nueva consola Nintendo Revolution lanzada por la compañía. De modo semejante a lo que ocurre con un control remoto de televisión, este control está provisto de dos sensores ubicados cerca del televisor del usuario, posibilitando la triangulación de su posición en un espacio tridimensional. Esto permitirá a los jugadores controlar las acciones y los movimientos en los videojuegos, a través del movimiento del dispositivo por el aire.
mt: On Thursday, at the inaugural presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Satoru Iwata, president of Nintendo, unveiled the design of the controller for the new Nintendo Revolution console released by the company. Similar to a television remote control, this controller is equipped with two sensors near the user's television, allowing for triangulation of its position in a three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games, through movement of the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Con anterioridad, la agencia de noticias de China, Xinhua, había comunicado el secuestro de un avión. Según informes subsiguientes, la aeronave recibió una amenaza de bomba y se la desvió de vuelta hacia Afganistán, donde aterrizó en Kandahar. Los informes preliminares indican que la aeronave fue desviada de vuelta a Afganistán luego de negarle autorización para realizar un aterrizaje de emergencia en Urumchi.
mt: Previously, China's Xinhua news agency had reported the plane was hijacked. Subsequent reports indicated the aircraft received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. Preliminary reports indicate the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied permission to make an emergency landing in Urumchi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: El lunes, Sara Danius, secretaria permanente del Comité por el Nobel de Literatura de la Academia Sueca, declaró públicamente en un programa radiofónico de Sveriges, en Suecia, que, al no poder contactar directamente con Bob Dylan para comunicarle el premio en Literatura 2016, el comité había abandonado sus esfuerzos por comunicarse con él. Danius declaró: «Actualmente no estamos haciendo nada. Llamé y envié correos electrónicos a su asistente más cercano y recibí contestaciones muy cordiales. Por el momento, eso es sin dudas suficiente».
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, publicly announced on a Swedish radio program that, after being unable to directly contact Bob Dylan to inform him of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, the committee had given up its efforts to contact him. Danius stated: "We're not doing anything at the moment. I called and sent emails to his closest assistant and received very cordial replies. That's definitely enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: George W. Bush, presidente de los Estados Unidos, recibió con gusto el anuncio. Gordon Johndroe, vocero de Bush, se refirió al compromiso norcoreano como «un avance importante hacia el objetivo de alcanzar la desnuclearización constatable de la península de Corea».
mt: George W. Bush, President of the United States, welcomed the announcement. Gordon Johndroe, Bush's spokesman, referred to the North Korean commitment as "an important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula".
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: En 1956, Słania se trasladó a Suecia, donde, después de tres años, consiguió un empleo en la oficina postal sueca y allí se convirtió en Chief engraver. La cantidad de sellos que confeccionó, tanto para Suecia como para otras 28 naciones, supera las mil unidades. La calidad y el nivel de detalle de su labor son tan reconocidos que se ha vuelto uno de los pocos «nombres familiares» entre los filatelistas. Hay personas que se especializan en recopilar su obra. Incluido en el libro Guinness de los récords mundiales, su milésimo sello fue el formidable «Hazañas memorables de los reyes suecos» (David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, año 2000). Además, tuvo participación en al grabado de billetes para muchos estados, siendo los ejemplos más recientes de su labor los retratos del primer ministro visibles en el anverso de los nuevos billetes de 5 y 100 dólares canadienses.
mt: In 1956, Słania moved to Sweden, where, after three years, he got a job at the Swedish post office and there became Chief engraver. The number of stamps he designed, both for Sweden and for 28 other nations, exceeds a thousand. The quality and level of detail of his work are so recognized that he has become one of the few "household names" among philatelists. There are people who specialize in collecting his work. Included in the Guinness Book of World Records, his thousandth stamp was the formidable "Memorable deeds of Swedish kings" (David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, year 2000). In addition, he had a hand in the engraving of bills for many states, the most recent examples of his work being the portraits of the prime minister visible on the obverse of the new 5 and 100 Canadian dollar bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Tras un derrame de miles barriles de aceite crudo en el sur de Fairbanks, se cerraron 800 millas del sistema de oleoducto Trans-Alaska. Petróleo crudo se desbordó cerca de la estación de bombeo de Fort Greely 9, debido a la apertura de las válvulas de escape que se a causa de una interrupción en el servicio de electricidad, ocurrido tras una prueba de rutina del sistema de comando de incendios. Al abrirse las válvulas, se produjo la liberación de presión para el sistema y el petróleo fluyó en una plataforma hacia un tanque que puede abarcar 55 000 barriles (2.3 millones de galones). Hasta el miércoles en la tarde, aún había pérdidas en las rejillas de ventilación del tanque, probablemente a causa de la expansión térmica en su interior. Otra área de contención secundaria que se ubica bajo los tanques, con una capacidad de 104 500 barriles, no se había llenado al tope aún.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska pipeline was closed after thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled in the south of Fairbanks. Crude oil spilled near the Fort Greely pumping station 9, due to the opening of the relief valves that caused a power outage, after a routine test of the fire control system. Opening the valves caused the pressure relief system and the oil flowed to a platform to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). Until Wednesday afternoon, there were still losses in the ventilation grates of the tank, probably due to thermal expansion inside. Another secondary containment area that is located under the tanks, with a capacity of 104,500 barrels, had not been filled to the top yet.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Según estimaciones realizadas por el Cuerpo de Ingenieros de los Estados Unidos, hasta 6 pulgadas de lluvia podrían filtrarse por los diques anteriormente dañados. Debido al desborde del dique que está cerca del Noveno Distrito, el agua llega hasta la cintura actualmente en ese lugar, que ya había sufrido inundaciones de hasta 20 pies a causa del huracán Katrina. El agua fluye encima del dique en un tramo que tiene un ancho de 100 pies.
mt: According to estimates made by the United States Corps of Engineers, up to 6 inches of rain could seep through the previously damaged levees. Due to the breach of the levee near the Ninth Ward, the water is currently up to the waist in that area, which had already suffered flooding of up to 20 feet due to Hurricane Katrina. The water is flowing over the levee in a 100-foot wide section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton confirmó que el Hospital de la Universidad Howard admitió el ingreso del paciente y que su condición era estable. El paciente había estado en Nigeria, donde hubo algunos casos de Ébola. El hospital ha respetado el protocolo de control de infecciones, incluido el distanciamiento del paciente de los demás para prevenir posibles infecciones.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University Hospital admitted the patient and that his condition was stable. The patient had been in Nigeria, where there had been some cases of Ebola. The hospital has respected the infection control protocol, including keeping the patient away from others to prevent possible infections.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Posiblemente, los cometas hayan servido como fuente de suministro de agua para nuestro planeta, así como de materia orgánica, la cual tiene la capacidad de formar proteínas y sustentar la vida. La expectativa de los científicos es comprender cómo se originan los planetas, en particular el nuestro, dado que los cometas se estrellaron en la Tierra mucho tiempo atrás.
mt: Comets may have served as a source of water for our planet, as well as organic matter, which has the ability to form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets originate, particularly ours, as comets crashed into Earth long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Aunque las autoridades no están seguras de que la amenaza sea real, la Autoridad de Transporte de Maryland procedió al cierre, a requerimiento del FBI. Se bloquearon los accesos a los túneles con camiones volquete y fue necesaria la participación de 80 agentes de policía para guiar a los automovilistas hacia los desvíos. La circunvalación, que es la carretera alternativa de la ciudad, no registró mayores demoras por tráfico.
mt: Although authorities are not sure the threat is real, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnels at the request of the FBI. The entrances to the tunnels were blocked with dump trucks and 80 police officers were needed to direct traffic to detours. The Beltway, the city's alternate route, did not experience major traffic delays.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Llevaron al fotógrafo al Centro Médico Ronald Reagan, UCLA, lugar en el que falleció más tarde. De acuerdo a los informes, estaba en sus veintes. Bieber manifestó en un comunicado: «[si bien] no estuve presente ni directamente involucrado en este terrible accidente, mis pensamientos y plegarias están con los familiares de la víctima». Según la página web de noticias de entretenimiento TMZ, el fotógrafo detuvo el vehículo del lado contrario del bulevar Sepulveda e intentó tomar fotografías de la parada policial antes de cruzar la calle y seguir, lo que causó que el agente de la patrulla caminera de California que realizaba la detención de vehículos le diera dos veces la orden de volver a cruzar. Según las autoridades policiales, es poco probable que el conductor del vehículo que embistió al fotógrafo sea procesado penalmente.
mt: The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. According to reports, he was in his twenties. Bieber stated in a statement: "[while] I was not present nor directly involved in this terrible accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim." According to the entertainment news website TMZ, the photographer stopped the vehicle on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take photographs of the traffic stop before crossing the street and continuing, causing the California Highway Patrol officer conducting the traffic stop to give him two orders to return to the sidewalk. According to police authorities, it is unlikely that the driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will be criminally prosecuted.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: El ministro presidencial, Rodrigo Arias anunció: «Arias dio positivo en un caso leve del virus». El presidente se encuentra estable, aunque permanecerá aislado en su casa por varios días. Excepto por el estado febril y el dolor de garganta, me siento bien y en buen estado para continuar con mis funciones en la modalidad de teletrabajo. «Espero poder volver a mis funciones el lunes», manifestó Arias en un comunicado.
mt: The presidential minister, Rodrigo Arias announced: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus." The president is stable, although he will remain isolated in his home for several days. Except for the feverish state and sore throat, I feel well and in good condition to continue with my functions in the teleworking mode. "I hope to be able to return to my functions on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Los vientos sostenidos del ciclón tropical Gonu, que recibió ese nombre del idioma de las Maldivas en referencia a un saco de hojas de palma, llegaron a los 240 km/h (149 mph) en su pico máximo. Esta mañana temprano, los vientos eran de alrededor de 83 km/h y se esperaba que siguieran disminuyendo.
mt: Gonu's sustained winds from the tropical cyclone reached 240 km/h (149 mph) at its peak. Winds were around 83 km/h this morning and were expected to continue to decrease.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: La marea roja es originada por una densidad superior a la regular de Karenia Brevis, organismo marino formado por una sola célula y que es de origen natural. Los factores naturales pueden combinarse y generar condiciones óptimas, lo que permite que el alga crezca enormemente en cantidad. Las algas generan una sustancia neurotóxica capaz de inhabilitar los nervios, no solo de los peses, sino también de los seres humanos. Con frecuencia, las concentraciones elevadas de la toxina en las aguas provocan la muerte de los peces. El agua afectada que llega al aire por el viento y las olas puede perjudicar a quienes la respiran.
mt: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal density of Karenia Brevis, a single-celled marine organism of natural origin. Natural factors can combine and generate optimal conditions, allowing the algae to grow enormously in quantity. The algae generate a neurotoxic substance capable of disabling nerves, not only of fish, but also of humans. Concentrations of the toxin in the water often cause the death of fish. Water affected by the wind and waves can harm those who breathe it.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: La tormenta Felicia, que tiempo antes había alcanzado la cuarta categoría en la escala de huracanes de Saffir-Simpson, se redujo a una depresión tropical antes de desvanecerse el día martes. Sus remanentes provocaron precipitaciones en casi todas las islas, pero hasta ahora no hay registros de daños o inundaciones. La lluvia, que alcanzó las 6.34 pulgadas según un medidor de Oahu, se describió como «provechosa». Parte de las precipitaciones contaron, además, con tormentas eléctricas y numerosos relámpagos.
mt: Tropical Storm Felicia, which had earlier reached the fourth category on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. Its remnants caused rainfall on almost all the islands, but so far there are no reports of damage or flooding. The rain, which reached 6.34 inches according to a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial". Some of the precipitation also included thunderstorms and numerous lightning strikes.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Durante el Gran Premio de Singapur de 2008, justo después de una parada en boxes, Piquet Jr. se estrelló para forzar la salida del auto de seguridad y así beneficiar a Fernando Alonso. Cuando los automóviles delante de Alonso se detuvieron para recargar combustible durante la pasada del coche de seguridad, él aumentó los cambios para obtener la victoria. Luego del GP de Hungría en el año 2009, expulsaron a Piquet Jr.
mt: During the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, just after a pit stop, Piquet Jr. crashed to force the safety car out and thus benefit Fernando Alonso. When the cars ahead of Alonso stopped to refuel during the safety car's lap, he upshifted to take the win. After the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix, Piquet Jr. was sacked.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: El jueves, la revista Science dio a conocer una investigación que informaba sobre la aparición de una nueva especie de ave en las islas Galápagos ecuatorianas. Expertos de la Universidad de Princeton, en EE. UU., y de la de Uppsala, en Suecia, dieron a conocer que la nueva especie logró evolucionar en tan solo dos generaciones, aun cuando se estimaba que demoraría mucho más, a causa de la reproducción entre un pinzón de Darwin endémico, Geospiza fortes, y un pinzón de cactus migrante, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: On Thursday, the journal Science published a study reporting the discovery of a new bird species in Ecuador's Galápagos Islands. Princeton University and Uppsala University experts announced that the new species evolved in just two generations, despite estimates that it would take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and a migrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Además, la exhibición artística integra una campaña del Ayuntamiento de Bucarest cuyo objetivo es relanzar la imagen de la capital de Rumania como una ciudad cosmopolita creativa y vivaz. Este año, de junio a agosto, la ciudad será la primera en el sureste de Europa en ser anfitriona del CowParade, el evento artístico gratuito más grande del mundo.
mt: Additionally, the art exhibition integrates a campaign by the City of Bucharest whose goal is to relaunch the image of the capital of Romania as a cosmopolitan creative and lively city. This year, from June to August, the city will be the first in Southeast Europe to host the CowParade, the world's largest free art event.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: La aeronave viajaba hacia Irkutsk y la guiaban tropas del interior. Se dio inicio a una pesquisa para investigar. El Il-76 ha funcionado como un componente de gran importancia para la milicia rusa y soviética desde la década de 1970 y ya había sufrido un severo siniestro en Rusia, el mes pasado. El 7 de octubre, un motor se separó al despegar, sin dejar heridos. Rusia hizo permanecer en tierra los Il-76 por poco tiempo después de ese accidente.
mt: The aircraft was en route to Irkutsk and was being flown by an interior squadron. An investigation was launched. The Il-76 has been an important component of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s and had already suffered a serious crash in Russia last month. On October 7, an engine fell off while taking off, without injuring anyone. Russia grounded the Il-76s for a short time after that accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Previamente a Los Simpson, Simon había tenido varios empleos en otros espectáculos televisivos, en distintos puestos. En los 80, prestó su colaboración en varios programas, por ejemplo, Taxi, Cheers y The Tracy Ullman Show. En 1989, ayudó con la creación de Los Simpson, con Brooks y Groening, y fue responsable de la contratación del primer equipo de escritores de la serie. Aunque se fue del programa en 1993, conservó el título de productor ejecutivo y siguió percibiendo decenas de millones de dólares en regalías temporada tras temporada.
mt: Previously to The Simpsons, Simon had held various jobs on other television shows, in different positions. In the 80s, he contributed to several programs, for example, Taxi, Cheers and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons, with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the first writing team of the series. Although he left the program in 1993, he kept the title of executive producer and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars in royalties season after season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke escribió que los esfuerzos de algunos para acallar a las mujeres que hablan sobre la salud de estas no prosperaron. Concluyó esto en base al gran número de comentarios positivos y alentadores de parte de mujeres y hombres instando a que los medicamentos anticonceptivos fueran considerados como una necesidad sanitaria.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts by some to silence women who speak about the health of these [contraceptives] did not prosper. She concluded this based on the large number of positive and encouraging comments from women and men urging that contraceptives be considered as a health necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Se comportará igual que el agua. Es transparente, tal como lo es el agua. Por lo tanto, si estuviera de pie junto a la orilla, podría observar cualquier pequeña piedra o porquería que hubiese en el fondo. «Por lo que sabemos hasta ahora, solo hay un planeta que presenta más dinamismo que Titán; se le llama Tierra», agregó Stofan.
mt: It will behave like water. It is transparent, just as water is. So, if you were standing next to the shore, you could see any little pebble or detritus that might be on the bottom. "As far as we know, there's only one planet that has more dynamism than Titan; it's called Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

mt: It will behave like water. It is transparent, just as water is. So, if you were standing next to the shore, you could see any little pebble or detritus that might be on the bottom. "As far as we know, there's only one planet that has more dynamism than Titan; it's called Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Además de confirmar que al menos algunos dinosaurios eran plumíferos, una teoría ya generalizada, también ofrece datos específicos que los fósiles por lo general no ofrecen, como su color y su estructura tridimensional. Según los especialistas, este animal tiene un plumaje de color castaño en la zona superior y una tonalidad pálida o carotenoide en la parte de abajo. Asimismo, el hallazgo permite comprender mejor la evolución de las plumas de las aves. Dado que el plumaje de los dinosaurios no tiene un eje bien desarrollado, denominado raquis, pero sí presenta otros rasgos de las plumas (cerdas y bárbulas), los investigadores llegaron a la conclusión de que es probable que el raquis sea el resultado de un desarrollo evolutivo posterior de estas otras características. La estructura que presenta el plumaje sugiere que su función no estaba relacionada con el vuelo, sino que las usaban para regular la temperatura o como indicador de la misma. Los investigadores sostienen que, aunque se trata de la cola de un dinosaurio joven, la muestra analizada presenta rasgos del plumaje de un adulto y no de un polluelo. Las apreciaciones de los expertos fueron que, aun cuando se trata de la cola de un dinosaurio de corta edad, la muestra ilustra más el plumaje de un adulto que el de un polluelo.
mt: In addition to confirming that at least some dinosaurs were feathered, a theory already widely accepted, it also provides specific details that fossils generally do not, such as its color and three-dimensional structure. According to experts, this animal has a chestnut-colored plumage on top and a pale or carotenoid tone on the bottom. In addition, the discovery allows a better understanding of the evolution of bird feathers. Since the plumage of dinosaurs does not have a well-developed axis, called the rachis, but does have other feather features (hairs and barbs), researchers concluded that the rachis is likely the result of a later evolutionary development of these other characteristics. The structure that the plumage presents suggests that its function was not related to flight, but that they used them to regulate temperature or as an indicator of the same. Researchers say that although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample analyzed presents features of the plumage of an adult and not of a chick. The experts' assessments were that, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample illustrates more the plumage of an adult than that of a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
