src: Existe un gran número de playas, debido a que Auckland cuenta con dos puertos. Las más conocidas se encuentran en tres áreas. En el distrito de North Harbour, en el Océano Pacífico, se encuentran las playas de North Shore, que despliegan desde Long Bay, en el norte, hasta Devonport, en el sur. Las playas son casi todas de arena con lugares seguros para nadar y en su mayoría tienen árboles pohutukawa que ofrecen lugares de sombra. En el puerto de Waitemataas se despliegan las playas de Tamaki Drive, en los extravagantes barrios de Mission Bay y St Heliers, en la región central de Auckland. Estas son playas familiares, en ocasiones muy concurridas, con numerosas y variadas tiendas disponibles sobre la cosa. También son seguras para nadar.
mt: There are a large number of beaches, due to Auckland having two ports. The most well known are in three areas. In the North Harbour district, in the Pacific Ocean, are the North Shore beaches, which stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. The beaches are mostly sandy with safe swimming areas and mostly have pohutukawa trees which provide shade. In the Waitemata Harbour are the beaches of Tamaki Drive, in the posh suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers, in central Auckland. These are family beaches, sometimes very crowded, with numerous and varied shops available on the beach. They are also safe for swimming.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: No olvide que, básicamente, usted está visitando un lugar que ofició de fosa común y que también es un sitio de un significado prácticamente invaluable para una parte importante de la población del mundo. Aún quedan muchos hombres y mujeres con vida que sobrevivieron a su estadía en este lugar y muchos más que tuvieron seres queridos a los que asesinaron o trabajaron allí hasta su muerte, tanto judíos como no judíos. Dele al lugar toda la dignidad, la solemnidad y el respeto que amerita. No bromee acerca del Holocausto o el nazismo. No arruine el lugar haciendo marcas ni haga grafitis en las estructuras.
mt: Remember that, basically, you are visiting a place that served as a mass grave and that is also a site of almost invaluable significance to a significant part of the world's population.  There are still many men and women alive who survived their stay in this place and many more who had loved ones killed or worked there until their deaths, both Jews and non-Jews.  Give the place all the dignity, solemnity, and respect it deserves.  Don't joke about the Holocaust or Nazism.  Don't ruin the place by making marks or graffiti on the structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Los lenguajes auxiliares son idiomas artificiales o construidos que se crean con el fin de facilitar la comunicación entre pueblos que, de otra forma, tendrían problemas para comunicarse. Se diferencian de las lenguas vehiculares, que son aquellas naturales u orgánicas que, por algún motivo, se vuelven dominantes como herramienta de comunicación entre hablantes de otros idiomas.
mt: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created to facilitate communication between peoples who otherwise would have difficulty communicating. They differ from vehicular languages, which are natural or organic languages that, for some reason, become dominant as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Los lenguajes auxiliares son idiomas artificiales o construidos que se crean con el fin de facilitar la comunicación entre pueblos que, de otra forma, tendrían problemas para comunicarse. src: Si va a cruzar el norte del Báltico en época invernal, constate dónde se localiza la cabina, puesto que atravesar el hielo genera un ruido muy molesto para los más afectados. Durante los cruceros por San Petersburgo también se pasa tiempo en la ciudad. Se exime a quienes desembarcan de los requerimientos de visado (consulte términos).
mt: If you are going to cross the Baltic in winter, check where the cabin is located, as crossing the ice generates a very annoying noise for the most affected. During cruises to St. Petersburg, time is also spent in the city. Those who disembark are exempt from visa requirements (see terms).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Si va a cruzar el norte del Báltico en época invernal, constate dónde se localiza la cabina, puesto que atravesar el hielo genera un ruido muy molesto para los más afectados. ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: El catalán y el español son los idiomas oficiales de Barcelona. Aproximadamente la mitad de su gente prefiere hablar el catalán, la gran mayoría lo comprende y prácticamente todos saben español. No obstante, debido a que el catalán es, legalmente, la primera lengua de carácter oficial, la mayor parte de los letreros están redactados solo en ese idioma. Aun así, el español también se utiliza mucho en el transporte público y otros edificios. Si bien los anuncios habituales en el Metro solo se exhiben en catalán, las interrupciones no planificados se realizan en una gran variedad de idiomas a través de un programa automático en una gran variedad de idiomas, entre ello, español, inglés, francés, árabe y japonés.
mt: Catalan and Spanish are the official languages of Barcelona. Approximately half of its people prefer to speak Catalan, the vast majority understand it and practically everyone knows Spanish. However, because Catalan is, legally, the first official language of character, most signs are written only in that language. Nevertheless, Spanish is also used a lot in public transport and other buildings. While the usual announcements in the Metro are only displayed in Catalan, unplanned interruptions are made in a wide variety of languages through an automated program in a wide variety of languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: El catalán y el español son los idiomas oficiales de Barcelona. Aproximadamente la mitad de su gente prefiere hablar el catalán, la gran mayoría lo comprende y prácticamente todos saben español. No obstante, debido a que el catalán es, legalmente, la primera lengua de carácter oficial, la mayor parte de los letreros están redactados solo en ese idioma. Aun así, el español también se utiliza mucho en el transporte público y otros edificios. Si bien los anuncios habituales en el Metro solo se exhiben en catalán, las interrupciones no planificados se realizan en una gran variedad de idiomas a través de un programa automático en una gran variedad de idiomas, entre ello, español, inglés, francés, árabe y japonés.
mt: Catalan and Spanish are the official languages of Barcelona. Approximately half of its people prefer to speak Catalan, the vast majority understand it and practically everyone knows Spanish. However, because Catalan is, legally, the first official language of character, most signs are written only in that language. Nevertheless, Spanish is also used a lot in public transport and other buildings. While the usual announcements in the Metro are only displayed in Catalan, unplanned interruptions are made in a wide variety of languages through an automated program in a wide variety of languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: En la actualidad, brindar hospedaje y desayuno de lujo se ha vuelto, para los países del primer mundo, en una clase de forma de arte. En la mejor categoría, la contienda entre los B&B se da, por supuesto, en dos servicios: la ropa de cama y el desayuno. Por consiguiente, en los establecimientos más exclusivos de este tipo, uno podrá encontrarse con la ropa de cama más lujosa, quizás un cubrecama confeccionado a mano o una cama antigua. Para el desayuno pueden servirse delicias de temporada de esa región o la especialidad de quien oficia de anfitrión. El escenario podría estar compuesto por edificio histórico con mobiliario antiguo, jardines impecables o una piscina de natación.
mt: Currently, providing luxury accommodation and breakfast has become, for the first world countries, a form of art. In the best category, the competition between B&Bs is, of course, in two services: the bed linen and the breakfast. Therefore, in the most exclusive establishments of this type, one can find the most luxurious bed linen, perhaps a handmade quilt or an old bed. For breakfast, seasonal delicacies from that region or the specialty of the host may be served. The setting could be composed of a historical building with antique furniture, immaculate gardens or a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: La ciudad de Pekín, en China, será anfitriona de los Juegos Olímpicos de Invierno en 2022, con lo cual pasará a ser la primera ciudad sede de la competencia de verano y de invierno. Pekín será anfitriona de las ceremonias de apertura y clausura y de los eventos sobre hielo que se realicen bajo techo. En el área de esquí ubicada en Taizicheng, Zhangjiakou, que se encuentra unos de 220 km (140 mi) de Pekín, tendrán lugar otros eventos de ese deporte.
mt: Beijing, China, will host the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the summer and winter games. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the ice events indoors. Other events will take place in the ski area in Taizicheng, Zhangjiakou, which is about 220 km (140 mi) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: La gripe aviar, denominada con mayor formalidad influenza aviar, puede afectar a aves y mamíferos. Aun cuando se han registrado menos de mil casos en personas, algunos de estos tuvieron un desenlace fatal. Si bien casi todos los afectados tenían contacto en sus trabajos con aves de corral, también puede haber algún riesgo para los observadores de aves.
mt: Avian flu, formally known as avian influenza, can affect birds and mammals. While there have been less than a thousand cases in humans, some of these have had fatal outcomes. While almost all affected had contact with poultry in their work, there is some risk for birdwatchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Las rutas navegables rusas fueron usadas por los vikingos para dirigirse al Mar Negro y al Mar Caspio. Aún es posible utilizar partes de estas vías. Consulte si es preciso contar con autorizaciones especiales, lo que es una posibilidad, y podría ser difícil obtener. El Océano Ártico está ligado al Mar Báltico a través del Canal del Mar Blanco-Báltico, por medio de los lagos Onega y Ladoga y a San Petersburgo, mayormente por ríos y lagos. Gracias a que el lago Onega también se une con el Volga, se puede acceder a él desde el mar Caspio, pasando por Rusia.
mt: Russian navigable routes were used by the Vikings to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some parts of these routes are still usable. Check if special permissions are required, which is a possibility, and may be difficult to obtain. The Arctic Ocean is linked to the Baltic Sea through the White Sea-Baltic Canal, via the lakes Onega and Ladoga and to St. Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Thanks to the Onega Lake also being connected to the Volga, it can be reached from the Caspian Sea, passing through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Por lo general, un puesto de control de inmigración es la primera parada al descender de una aeronave, barco u otro medio de transporte. En ciertos ferrocarriles transfronterizos, se realizan inspecciones dentro del tren en movimiento, por lo que usted debe tener una identificación válida al abordar uno de ellos. En los ferrocarriles nocturnos, el conductor puede recolectar los pasaportes para no interrumpir su descanso.
mt: A border control post is usually the first stop after disembarking from an aircraft, ship or other mode of transport. In some cross-border trains, inspections are conducted on the moving train, so you must have a valid identification when boarding one of them. On overnight trains, the conductor may collect the passports to not interrupt his rest.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Por lo general, Singapur es un lugar muy seguro para estar y muy sencillo de recorrer; además, puede comprar casi cualquier producto desde su arribo. Pero, debido a su ubicación en los «trópicos altos», a unos pocos grados al norte del ecuador, usted deberá lidiar siempre con el calor y, cuando el cielo está despejado, con el sol fuerte, lo que sucede con menor frecuencia.
mt: Singapore is generally a very safe place to be and very easy to get around; you can buy almost anything upon arrival. But, due to its location in the "high tropics", a few degrees north of the equator, you will always have to deal with the heat and, when the sky is clear, with the strong sun, which happens less frequently.
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: La pastelería alemana es de buena calidad y, en Baviera, los pasteles son bastante sabrosos y variados, semejantes a los que preparan en Austria, su vecino del sur. Son comunes los pasteles frutales, con manzanas cocidas en su interior durante todo el año y cerezas y ciruelas que aparecen en el verano. Muchos de los productos alemanes que se preparan al horno tienen también almendras, avellanas y otros frutos secos. En general, los pasteles populares hacen una excelente combinación con una taza de café fuerte. Si tiene antojo de pasteles pequeños pero sabrosos, pruebe el Berliner, también llamado Pfannkuchen o Krapfen, según la región.
mt: German pastries are of good quality and, in Bavaria, cakes are quite tasty and varied, similar to those prepared in Austria, its southern neighbor. Fruit cakes are common, with baked apples inside all year and cherries and plums that appear in the summer. Many of the German products baked in the oven also have almonds, hazelnuts and other nuts. In general, popular cakes make an excellent combination with a strong cup of coffee. If you have a craving for small but tasty cakes, try the Berliner, also called Pfannkuchen or Krapfen, depending on the region.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Si tiene deseos conocer el mundo a un bajo costo, sea por necesidad, estilo de vida o como un reto, existen algunas maneras para hacerlo. Se dividen, en esencia, en dos clases: los que trabajan mientras viajan y los que procuran restringir los gastos. Este artículo trata sobre los segundos. Quienes acepten relegar la comodidad, el tiempo y la previsibilidad en pos de disminuir los costos prácticamente a cero averigüen por viajes de presupuesto mínimo. La recomendación supone que los viajeros no roban, violan la propiedad privada, participan en el mercado ilegal, mendigan o de algún otro modo explotan a otras personas en beneficio propio.
mt: If you want to see the world on a shoestring, whether by necessity, lifestyle or as a challenge, there are some ways to do it. They essentially fall into two categories: those who work while they travel and those who try to restrict their spending. This article is about the latter. Those who are willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability in order to reduce costs to practically zero should investigate budget minimum travel. The recommendation assumes that travelers do not steal, violate private property, participate in the black market, beg or in any other way exploit others for their own benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: En la autopista de Búfalo-Pittsburgh, el tramo entre Point Marion y Fairmont es el de las condiciones de manejo más desafiantes y con frecuencia recorre terrenos apartados y solitarios. Si usted no suele conducir por carreteras rurales, manténgase alerta: existen muchas pendientes pronunciadas, carriles estrechos y curvas cerradas. Los límites establecidos de velocidad son notoriamente más bajos que en los tramos previos y en los que le siguen, por lo general de 35 a 40 mph (56-64 km/h), y su estricto cumplimiento es aún más importante que en cualquier otra sección. No obstante, curiosamente, la señal de los celulares es mucho mejor aquí que en muchas otras secciones de la carretera como Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: On the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Turnpike, the stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont is the most challenging driving conditions and often traverses remote and lonely terrain. If you don't usually drive on rural roads, stay alert: there are many steep grades, narrow lanes, and tight curves. Speed limits are notably lower than in the previous and following stretches, generally 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h), and their strict enforcement is even more important than in any other section. However, curiously, cell phone reception is much better here than in many other sections of the road as Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: El barranquismo consiste en ir hasta el fondo de un cañón que esté seco o lleno de agua. Si bien el barranquismo contiene elementos tanto de la natación, como de la escalada y el salto, es un deporte que exige relativamente poco entrenamiento o estado físico para quienes se inician en él (si se lo compara, por ejemplo, con la escalada en roca, el buceo o el esquí alpino).
mt: Canyoneering is the act of descending a canyon that is dry or filled with water. While canyoneering contains elements of both swimming, climbing, and jumping, it is a sport that requires relatively little training or physical fitness for those who are new to it (if compared, for example, to rock climbing, scuba diving, or alpine skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: El barranquismo consiste en ir hasta el fondo de un cañón que esté seco o lleno de agua. Si bien el barranquismo contiene elementos tanto de la natación, como de la escalada y el salto, es un deporte que exige relativamente poco entrenamiento o estado físico para quienes se inician en él (si se lo compara, por ejemplo, con la escalada en roca, el buceo o el esquí alpino).

While canyoneering contains elements of both swimming, climbing, and jumping, it is a sport that requires relatively little training or physical fitness for those who are new to it (if compared, for example, to rock climbing, scuba diving, or alpine skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Entrar en su propio vehículo y dar inicio a un extenso viaje por tierra tiene un atractivo intrínseco en su simpleza. A diferencia de lo que ocurre con automóviles de mayor porte, es probable que usted ya se encuentre familiarizado con la conducción de su rodado y esté al tanto de sus limitaciones. Levantar una carpa en un terreno privado o en un pueblo sin importar su tamaño puede atraer fácilmente atención que no desea. Sintetizando, es una grandiosa opción hacer un viaje por carretera en su propio automóvil, pero muy pocas veces le servirá como una forma de «acampar». Quienes tengan una miniván amplia, un SUV, un sedán o camioneta con asientos reclinables pueden acampar en su vehículo.
mt: Entering your own vehicle and starting an extensive overland journey has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike what happens with larger vehicles, it is likely that you are already familiar with driving your vehicle and aware of its limitations. Raising a tent in private land or in a village regardless of its size can easily attract attention that you do not want. Summarizing, it is a great option to make a road trip in your own vehicle, but very few times it will serve as a form of "camping". Those who have a minivan, an SUV, a sedan or pickup truck with reclining seats can camp in their vehicle.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

mt: Entering your own vehicle and starting an extensive overland journey has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike what happens with larger vehicles, it is likely that you are already familiar with driving your vehicle and aware of its limitations. Raising a tent in private land or in a village regardless of its size can easily attract attention that you do not want. Summarizing, it is a great option to make a road trip in your own vehicle, but very few times it will serve as a form of "camping". Those who have a minivan, an SUV, a sedan or pickup truck with reclining seats can camp in their vehicle.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Los fundadores de la moderna ciudad de Casablanca fueron los pescadores bereberes durante el siglo X a. C. y los fenicios, romanos y merenidas la usaron como puerto estratégico, denominado Anfa. Fue destruida y reconstruida por los portugueses con el nombre de Casa Branca, pero en 1755 la abandonaron después del acaecimiento de un terremoto. La ciudad fue reconstruida por orden del sultán marroquí con el nombre de Daru l-Badya y los comerciantes españoles que instalaron sus negocios en ese lugar la llamaron Casablanca. Casablanca es uno de los sitios más aburridos de todo Marruecos para ir de compras. En los alrededores de la antigua Medina, abundan los lugares en donde se venden artículos tradicionales marroquíes, como ollas de barro, cerámicas, productos de cuero, pipas de agua y toda una gama de bagatelas, aunque todo está preparado para los turistas.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC and was used as a strategic port by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merenidas, who called it Anfa. It was destroyed and rebuilt by the Portuguese as Casa Branca, but they abandoned it after the 1755 earthquake. The city was rebuilt by order of the Moroccan sultan with the name of Daru l-Badya and the Spanish merchants who set up their businesses there called it Casablanca. Casablanca is one of the most boring places in all of Morocco to go shopping. Around the old Medina, there are places where traditional Moroccan items are sold, such as clay pots, ceramics, leather goods, water pipes and a whole range of trinkets, although everything is prepared for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Hacia el norte y a fácil alcance se ubica la romántica y alucinante ciudad de Sintra, que ganó popularidad entre los extranjeros a raíz de un vívido relato que de sus esplendores hizo Lord Byron. En Scotturb, el autobús 403 se dirige con regularidad a Sintra y para en Cabo da Roca. También debe visitar, hacia el norte, el gran Santuario de Nuestra Señora de Fátima (Santuario) que es un sitio donde hubo apariciones de la Virgen María, famosas en todo el mundo.
mt: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and hallucinatory city of Sintra, which gained popularity among foreigners after a vivid account of its splendors was made by Lord Byron. In Scotturb, the bus 403 regularly goes to Sintra and stops at Cabo da Roca. Also visit, to the north, the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Sanctuary) which is a site where there were apparitions of the Virgin Mary, famous all over the world.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: En 1994, la zona de Nagorno-Karabaj, de grupo étnico armenio, en Azerbaiyán, se lanzó a la lucha contra los azeríes. Con el apoyo de Armenia, se formó una nueva república, aunque no es una nación establecida. Ni siquiera cuenta con el reconocimiento oficial del gobierno armenio. Los vínculos entre Armenia y Azerbaiyán siguen viéndose afectados por las diferencias de índole diplomático que giran en torno a esta región.
mt: 1994, the Nagorno-Karabakh region, of Armenian ethnic group, in Azerbaijan, launched a fight against the Azeris. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was formed, although it is not a recognized nation. Even the official recognition of the Armenian government. The links between Armenia and Azerbaijan continue to be affected by diplomatic differences revolving around this region.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Una de las principales ventajas de Charlotte, en Carolina del Norte, es que ofrece un buen número de opciones de calidad para familias. Los residentes de otras regiones con frecuencia refieren que la buena vida familiar es la razón primaria para mudarse allí y, muchas veces, los visitantes descubren que es fácil disfrutar de la ciudad con niños alrededor. La variedad de alternativas pensadas para niños de Uptown Charlotte ha crecido en forma vertiginosa durante los últimos 20 años. En Charlotte, no es común que las familias tomen taxis, pero pueden ser de alguna utilidad en ciertas situaciones. Se aplica un sobrecargo si son más de dos pasajeros, por lo que esta opción podría ser más cara de lo necesario.
mt: One of the main advantages of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it offers a good number of quality options for families. Residents of other regions often refer to the good family life as the primary reason for moving there, and many visitors discover that it is easy to enjoy the city with children around. The variety of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown rapidly over the last 20 years. In Charlotte, it is not common for families to take taxis, but they can be useful in certain situations. There is an extra charge if there are more than two passengers, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Hasta el siglo XVI, durante la era prehípánica, el norte chileno era de dominio inca, mientras que los indígenas araucanos (mapuches) residían en el centro y sur del país. Los mapuches también fueron una de las últimas tribus americanas independientes, que no quedaron absorbidas por completo por el dominio de la lengua española, sino hasta después de la independencia de Chile. Aunque la independencia de Chile fue declarada en 1810 (época en la que, a raíz de las guerras napoleónicas, España quedó sin un gobierno central operativo durante algunos años), el triunfo decisivo contra los españoles no ocurrió sino hasta 1818.
mt: Until the 16th century, during the pre-Hispanic era, northern Chile was under Inca rule, while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuches) resided in the center and south of the country. The Mapuches were also one of the last American tribes to remain independent, not being fully absorbed by the Spanish language until after Chile's independence. Although Chile's independence was declared in 1810 (when, as a result of the Napoleonic Wars, Spain was without an effective central government for several years), the decisive victory over the Spanish did not occur until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre (cinco tierras) abarca los pequeños pueblos costeños de Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza y Monterosso, que se encuentran en Liguria, Italia. Forman parte de la Lista del Patrimonio de la Humanidad de la Unesco. Con el paso de los siglos, las personas han construido cautelosamente plataformas en paisajes irregulares y empinados, hasta en los acantilados con vista al mar. Su encanto se debe, en parte, a la ausencia de desarrollo corporativo visible. Hay caminos, trenes y barcos que unen las aldeas y los vehículos no pueden acceder desde el exterior.
mt: Cinque Terre (five lands) comprises the small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, in Liguria, Italy. They are part of the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have built platforms cautiously in irregular and steep landscapes, even on cliffs overlooking the sea. Their charm is partly due to the absence of visible corporate development. There are paths, trains and boats that connect the villages and vehicles cannot access from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: En época invernal, la causa más habitual de accidentes son las carreteras, las acercas y, en particular, los escalones resbaladizos. Es esencial que cuente, cuando menos, con calzado con suelas apropiadas. Los zapatos de verano por lo general resbalan mucho en el hielo y la nieve, incluso hay botas de invierno que no son adecuadas. Es preciso que el patrón tenga una profundidad apropiada, de 5 mm (1/5 pulgadas) o superior, y que el material sea lo suficientemente suave en temperaturas bajas. Hay botas con tachuelas y existe un accesorio adicional con tachuelas para condiciones resbaladizas, que se adapta a casi cualquier calzado, tanto para los tacones como para la suela. Es preciso que los tacones sean bajos y anchos. Con frecuencia, se desparrama arena, grava o sal (cloruro de calcio) sobre las carreteras o caminos a fin de obtener una mejor adherencia.
mt: In winter, the most common cause of accidents are roads, sidewalks, and particularly slippery steps. It is essential that you, at least, have appropriate footwear. Summer shoes generally slip a lot on ice and snow, even there are winter boots that are not suitable. It is necessary that the tread be of appropriate depth, 5 mm (1/5 inches) or greater, and that the material be sufficiently smooth in low temperatures. There are boots with cleats and there is an additional accessory with cleats for slippery conditions, which can be adapted to almost any footwear, both for heels and for the sole. It is necessary that the heels be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often spread on roads or paths to obtain better adhesion.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Las Islas Cook, en Polinesia, Océano Pacífico, constituyen un estado insular en asociación voluntaria con Nueva Zelanda. Se trata de un archipiélago formado por 15 islas que se distribuyen en una superficie oceánica de 2.2 millones de km2. Debido a que comparte la misma zona horaria que Hawái, a veces estas islas son denominadas «Hawái abajo del todo». Si bien es más pequeño, a algunos visitantes de la tercera edad les recuerda a Hawái, antes de que se convirtiera en un estado y no existieran todos los grandes hoteles turísticos y otros desarrollos. Aunque no cuentan con ciudades, las Islas Cook están formadas por 15 islas. Las más importantes son Rarotonga y Aitutaki.
mt: The Cook Islands, in Polynesia, Pacific Ocean, are a self-governing state in voluntary association with New Zealand. It is an archipelago of 15 islands spread over an oceanic area of 2.2 million km2. Because it shares the same time zone as Hawaii, these islands are sometimes called "Hawaii all the way down". Although smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before it became a state and before all the large tourist hotels and other developments were built. Although they do not have cities, the Cook Islands are formed by 15 islands. The most important are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Se deben reservar los permisos con antelación. Para pasar la noche en Sirena, se exige contar con un permiso. La única estación de guardaparques que ofrece alojamiento en habitaciones y alimentos calientes aparte del campamento es Sirena. No así en La Leona, San Pedrillo y Los Patos, donde solo ofrecen acampar, sin servicio de comida. Si bien se pueden reservar permisos para estacionar directamente desde la estación de guardaparques en Puerto Jiménez, no se puede abonar con tarjeta de crédito. El Servicio de Parques (MINAE) no otorga permisos de ingreso con más de un mes de anticipación a la fecha de arribo prevista. CafeNet El Sol suministra un servicio de reservas por una tarifa de US$ 30 o $10 por pases diarios; más detalles, en la página del Corcovado.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. A permit is required to stay overnight at Sirena. The only ranger station that offers lodging and hot food apart from camping is Sirena. This is not the case at La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos, where only camping is offered, without food service. While permits for parking can be reserved directly from the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, credit cards are not accepted. The National Park Service (MINAE) does not issue permits more than one month in advance of the planned arrival date. CafeNet El Sol provides a reservation service for a fee of US$30 or $10 per daily passes; more details, on the Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

La única estación de guardaparques que ofrece alojamiento en habitaciones y alimentos calientes aparte del campamento es Sirena. No así en La Leona, San Pedrillo y Los Patos, donde solo ofrecen acampar, sin servicio de comida. Si bien se pueden reservar permisos para estacionar directamente desde la estación de guardaparques en Puerto Jiménez, no se puede abonar con tarjeta de crédito. El Servicio de Parques (MINAE) no otorga permisos de ingreso con más de un mes de anticipación a la fecha de arribo prevista. CafeNet El Sol suministra un servicio de reservas por una tarifa de US$ 30 o $10 por pases diarios; más detalles, en la página del Corcovado.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. A permit is required to stay overnight at Sirena. The only ranger station that offers lodging and hot food apart from camping is Sirena. This is not the case at La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos, where only camping is offered, without food service. While permits for parking can be reserved directly from the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, credit cards are not accepted. The National Park Service (MINAE) does not issue permits more than one month in advance of the planned arrival date. CafeNet El Sol provides a reservation service for a fee of US$30 or $10 per daily passes; more details, on the Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Mochilero en esquí: también conocido como esquí de zona rural, de travesía o senderismo en esquí. Si bien vinculan, en general no conlleva practicar el esquí de travesía o el montañismo de estilo alpino, desarrollados en suelos de pendiente pronunciada y con esquís y calzado mucho más rígidos. Imagínese la pista de esquí como una ruta de senderismo. En condiciones satisfactorias, logrará recorrer distancias un poco más largas que si lo hace a pie, pero muy rara vez alcanzará la velocidad del esquí a campo traviesa sin una mochila de buen peso en pistas acondicionadas.
mt: Backcountry skier: also known as backcountry skiing, ski touring or ski mountaineering. While related, it does not necessarily involve practicing backcountry skiing or alpine mountaineering style, developed on steep slopes with much stiffer skis and boots. Imagine the ski slope as a hiking trail. In good conditions, you will be able to cover a little longer distances than if you were on foot, but very rarely will you reach the speed of cross-country skiing without a good weight backpack on groomed slopes.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: El impacto de volver a casa se produce antes que el cultural (no existe un período de felicidad de «luna de miel»), tarda más en irse y puede ser más duro. Los viajeros a los que les fue fácil adaptarse a una nueva cultura a veces tienen muchas dificultades para volver a adaptarse a su cultura nativa. Cuando regrese a su casa después de residir en el extranjero, se habrá adaptado a esa nueva cultura y habrá perdido parte de los hábitos de su cultura natal. Cuando usted viajó al extranjero la primera vez, las personas probablemente fueron pacientes y comprensivas, pues sabían que los viajeros necesitan adaptarse a un nuevo país. La gente puede no prever que la tolerancia y la comprensión también son necesarias para los viajeros de regreso en sus hogares.
mt: The impact of coming home happens before the cultural (there is no honeymoon period of happiness), takes longer to go away and can be harder. Travelers who easily adapted to a new culture sometimes have great difficulty readapting to their native culture. When you return home after living abroad, you will have adapted to that new culture and lost part of the habits of your native culture. When you first traveled abroad, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travelers need to adapt to a new country. People may not foresee that patience and understanding are also necessary for travelers returning to their homes.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Los alces (también llamados uapitíes) no tienen una naturaleza agresiva, no obstante lo cual, se defenderán si se sienten amenazados. Si los individuos no perciben que los alces son potencialmente agresivos, podrían acercárseles más de lo adecuado y ponerse en peligro.
mt: Elk (also called wapiti) are not naturally aggressive, but will defend themselves if they feel threatened. If individuals do not perceive elk as potentially aggressive, they may approach them too closely and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Durante el calor diurno, es posible que los turistas vean espejismos que generan la ilusión de visualizar agua, entre otros. Estos pueden ser peligrosos si el viajero sigue el espejismo, lo que hará que desperdicie energía valiosa y el agua restante. Hasta los desiertos más cálidos pueden tornarse dramáticamente fríos durante la noche. Si no cuenta con ropa de abrigo, corre un riesgo real de sufrir de hipotermia.
mt: During the daytime heat, tourists may see mirages that create the illusion of seeing water, among others. These can be dangerous if the traveler follows the mirage, which will make them waste valuable energy and the remaining water. Even the hottest deserts can become dramatically cold at night. If you don't have warm clothing, you are at real risk of hypothermia.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: República Dominicana es un país del Caribe que ocupa la mitad oriental de la isla La Española, la cual comparte con Haití. Además de sus playas de arena blanca y de sus paisajes de montaña, el país acoge la ciudad europea más antigua de América, que ahora forma parte de Santo Domingo. Los primeros pobladores de la isla fueron los taínos y los caribes; estos últimos, que hablaban la lengua arahuaca, habían llegado a la isla aproximadamente en el año 10 000 a. C. Pocos años después de la llegada de los exploradores europeos, los conquistadores españoles redujeron la población de Taíno de manera significativa. Según Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), los colonos provenientes de España asesinaron cerca de cien mil taínos entre 1492 y 1498.
mt: Dominican Republic is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In addition to its white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country hosts the oldest European city in the Americas, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The first inhabitants of the island were the Taínos and the Caribs; the latter, who spoke the Arawakan language, had arrived on the island approximately in the year 10,000 BC. A few years after the arrival of European explorers, Spanish conquistadors significantly reduced the population of Taíno. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Treatise on the Indies), colonists from Spain killed about 100,000 Taínos between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Los deportes de nieve en descenso, como el esquí y la tablanieve, son disciplinas populares que consisten en deslizarse con esquís o una tabla fijada a los pies, sobre un terreno nevado. Esquiar es una actividad principal de viaje con muchos adeptos, en ocasiones llamados «amantes del esquí», que organizan sus vacaciones completamente en base al esquí en un sitio específico. La idea del esquí es muy antigua, ya que hay pinturas rupestres que representan esquiadores y que se remontan alrededor del 5.000 a.C. Como disciplina, el esquí alpino data de no después del siglo XVII. En 1861 los noruegos inauguraron el primer club recreativo de esquí en Australia.
mt: Downhill snow sports such as skiing and snowboarding are popular disciplines that consist of sliding on skis or a board attached to the feet, over a snow-covered terrain. Skiing is a mainstay of travel with many enthusiasts, sometimes called "ski lovers", who organize their entire vacations around skiing in a specific location. The idea of skiing is very old, as there are cave paintings that depict skiers and date back around 5,000 BC. As a discipline, alpine skiing dates back no later than the 17th century. In 1861 the Norwegians inaugurated the first recreational ski club in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: La ubicación de las islas de África Oriental es frente a la costa este de ese continente, en el Océano Índico. Madagascar es, por mucho, la más grande y un continente en sí mismo si hablamos de vida silvestre. La mayor parte de las islas más pequeñas constituyen estados independientes o asociadas con Francia y son populares por sus playas y complejos turísticos de lujo. El islam también fue llevado a las tierras por los árabes y se impuso, en buena medida, en las Comores y Mayotte. El punta pie inicial de la influencia europea y el colonialismo tuvo lugar en el siglo XV, a raíz del descubrimiento, por el explorador portugués, Vasco da Gama, de la ruta que une el Cabo de Europa con la India.
mt: The location of the East African islands is off the east coast of that continent, in the Indian Ocean. Madagascar is, by far, the largest and a continent in itself if we talk about wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent states or associated with France and are popular for their beaches and luxury tourist resorts. Islam was also brought to the lands by the Arabs and prevailed, to a large extent, in the Comoros and Mayotte. The first point of European influence and colonialism took place in the 15th century, as a result of the discovery, by the Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama, of the route that connects the Cape of Europe with India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Es tradición pasar la noche de Pascua en vela en algún sitio expuesto para contemplar la salida del sol. Hay, por supuesto, explicaciones teológicas cristianas de esta tradición, pero bien puede tratarse de un ritual precristiano de primavera y fertilidad. Las iglesias más tradicionales suelen ofrecer una Vigilia Pascual el día sábado en la noche durante el fin de semana de la Pascua y, por lo general, las congregaciones dan inicio a las celebraciones por la resurrección de Cristo apenas llega la medianoche.
mt: It is traditional to spend the night of Easter vigil in vigil at some exposed site to contemplate the sunrise. There are, of course, Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian spring and fertility ritual. More traditional churches usually offer an Easter vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend and, generally, congregations begin their celebrations of the resurrection of Christ at midnight.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: En el caso de los ciudadanos provenientes de Cuba, Ecuador exigen que a los mismos se les haya entregado una carta de invitación antes de ingresar al país por aeropuertos internacionales o puestos de admisión en las fronteras. Se exige que esta carta cuente con la legalización del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Ecuador y que cumpla ciertos requisitos. El objetivo de estos requisitos es proporcionar una circulación migratoria organizada entre ambos países. Quienes provengan de Cuba y cuenten con una tarjeta verde de los EE. UU. deben presentarse ante un consulado ecuatoriano para que se les otorgue la exención de este requisito. Se exige que la vigencia de su pasaporte se extienda por al menos 6 meses más después de sus fechas de viaje. Se quiere, además, que cuente con un pasaje de ida y de vuelta, ello a fin de comprobar la extensión de su estadía.
mt: In the case of citizens from Cuba, Ecuador requires that they have been given an invitation letter before entering the country through international airports or border posts. This letter must be legalized by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ecuador and must meet certain requirements. The purpose of these requirements is to provide organized migration between both countries. Those coming from Cuba and having a green card from the US must present themselves to an Ecuadorian consulate to be granted exemption from this requirement. It is required that the validity of your passport extends for at least 6 months after your travel dates. It is also required that you have a round-trip ticket, this in order to verify the duration of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Los lentes pueden ser más económicos en un país extranjero, en particular en aquellos de bajos ingresos donde el coste laboral es menor. Considere la opción de realizarse un examen ocular en su país de origen, sobre si lo cubre el seguro, y luego llevar la prescripción médica para presentarla en cualquier otro destino del mundo. Las sillas de montar de marcas de alta calidad que pueden adquirirse en esa zona pueden presentar dos inconvenientes: algunas pueden ser imitaciones y las importadas auténticas pueden ser más costosas que en el país de origen.
mt: Glasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, particularly in those of low income where labor costs are lower. Consider the option of getting an eye exam in your country of origin, whether it is covered by insurance, and then bringing the medical prescription to present it in any other destination in the world. High quality saddles that can be purchased in that area may present two drawbacks: some may be imitations and the imported authentic ones may be more expensive than in the country of origin.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Los lentes pueden ser más económicos en un país extranjero, en particular en aquellos de bajos ingresos donde el coste laboral es menor. Considere la opción de realizarse un examen ocular en su país de origen, sobre si lo cubre el seguro, y luego llevar la prescripción médica para presentarla en cualquier otro destino del mundo. Las sillas de montar de marcas de alta calidad que pueden adquirirse en esa zona pueden presentar dos inconvenientes: algunas pueden ser imitaciones y las importadas auténticas pueden ser más costosas que en el país de origen.

High quality saddles that can be purchased in that area may present two drawbacks: some may be imitations and the imported authentic ones may be more expensive than in the country of origin.

High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: El valor de la libra de las Malvinas (FKP), moneda oficial de las Islas Malvinas, se fija en equivalencia con la británica (GBP). Existe un único banco en las islas. Allí puede cambiar su dinero. Está frente a la tienda FIC West, en Stanley. Se suelen aceptar libras esterlinas en cualquier sitio dentro de las islas. En Stanley, también se puede pagar con tarjetas de crédito o dólares estadounidenses. Existen probabilidades de que en las islas de la periferia no se acepten tarjetas de crédito, pero sí podría utilizar dinero británico o estadounidense. Pregunte con antelación a los propietarios para poder definir cuál es el método de pago aceptado. Es prácticamente imposible cambiar dinero de las Islas Malvinas fuera del archipiélago, por ello, procure hacerlo antes de marcharse.
mt: The value of the Falkland pound (FKP), the official currency of the Falkland Islands, is fixed in relation to the British pound (GBP). There is only one bank on the islands. You can change your money there. It is in front of the FIC West store, in Stanley. Sterling pounds are usually accepted anywhere on the islands. In Stanley, you can also pay with credit cards or U.S. dollars. There is a chance that in the outlying islands credit cards will not be accepted, but British or U.S. money might be. Ask the owners beforehand to determine which method of payment is accepted. It is almost impossible to change money from the Falkland Islands outside the archipelago, so try to do it before you leave.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: La mayoría de los templos celebra un festival anual cuyo inicio puede tener lugar entre noviembre y mediados de mayo, lo que depende del calendario anual de cada templo. La mayoría de los festivales en el templo son celebrados como parte del aniversario del mismo o el cumpleaños de la deidad reinante, o cualquier otro evento importante que se relacione con el templo. Una procesión regular de elefantes adornados, la orquesta del templo y otras festividades hacen que los festivales del templo de Kerela sean muy seductores.
mt: Most temples celebrate an annual festival whose start can take place between November and mid-May, depending on the annual calendar of each temple. Most temple festivals in Kerala are celebrated as part of the temple's anniversary or the birthday of the reigning deity, or any other important event related to the temple. A regular procession of decorated elephants, the temple orchestra and other festivities make Kerala temple festivals very alluring.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: La forma evidente de viajar en la primera clase o en la clase ejecutiva de un avión es gastar una fortuna por ese privilegio (o, lo que es mejor, hacer que su compañía pague por usted). Pero esto tiene un precio: en términos generales, puedes llegar a pagar hasta cuatro veces más la tarifa económica en clase business y hasta once en clase. Por lo general, es una tontería buscar descuentos para asientos de primera clase o clase business en vuelos directos. Las empresas aéreas son bien conscientes de que hay un grupo básico de viajeros que está dispuesto a pagar mucho dinero por el privilegio de llegar a un sitio rápido y cómodamente, y cobrar en consecuencia.
mt: The obvious way to travel in first class or business class on an airplane is to spend a fortune for that privilege (or, what is better, make your company pay for you). But this has a price: in general, you can pay up to four times the economy fare in business class and up to eleven in first class. In general, it is a waste to look for discounts for first class or business class seats on direct flights. Airlines are well aware that there is a basic group of travelers willing to pay a lot of money for the privilege of getting somewhere quickly and comfortably, and charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Compañías aéreas tales como Emirates, Etihad, Qatar y Turkish Airlines han incrementado inmensamente sus vuelos a África y ofrecen conexiones a muchas de las principales ciudades del continente, a mejor precio que otras empresas europeas. Desde el año 2014, Turkish Airlines tiene vuelos a 39 destinos en 30 países de África. Si tienen tiempo de más durante el viaje, averigüe cómo se compara la cotización de su tarifa total a África con una tarifa para viajar alrededor del mundo. Recuerde incluir los gastos adicionales, los impuestos de partida, el transporte terrestre, etc. para todos los lugares que visite fuera de África.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad, Qatar and Turkish Airlines have greatly increased their flights to Africa and offer connections to many of the continent's major cities at a better price than other European companies. Since 2014, Turkish Airlines has flights to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have extra time during your trip, find out how your total fare to Africa compares to a fare to travel around the world. Remember to include additional costs, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all places you visit outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Por lo general, la forma más económica de alimentarse es comprando la comida en los supermercados. No obstante, si cocinar no es posible, las opciones se reducen a los alimentos ya preparados. Los supermercados reciben cada vez una mayor variedad de alimentos preparados. Algunos, hasta ofrecen un microondas u otros medios para calentar la comida. En algunos países o tipos de tiendas, existe al menos un restaurante dentro del lugar, que, por lo general, es bastante informal y sus precios, económicos.
mt: The most economical way to feed oneself is usually to buy food at supermarkets. However, if cooking is not possible, the options are reduced to pre-prepared foods. Supermarkets receive an increasing variety of pre-prepared foods. Some even offer a microwave or other means to heat the food. In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant within the place, which is usually quite informal and its prices, economical.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Existen sutiles diferencias entre las variantes del francés habladas en Bélgica y Suiza el que se usa en Francia; no obstante, su similitud alcanza para que sean mutuamente inteligibles. En particular, el sistema numérico de Bélgica y Suiza francófonas tiene ligeras peculiaridades que difieren del francés que se habla en Francia y la pronunciación de algunas palabras es sutilmente distinta. No obstante, todos los belgas y suizos de habla francesa habrán aprendido francés estándar en el colegio, por tanto, podrían comprenderlo, aun si les hablara usando el sistema de numeración del francés estándar.
mt: There are subtle differences between the varieties of French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland and that used in France; however, their similarity is such that they are mutually intelligible. In particular, the Belgian and Swiss French-speaking numerical system has slight peculiarities that differ from the French spoken in France and the pronunciation of some words is subtly different. However, all Belgians and Swiss of French-speaking background will have learned standard French in school, so they could understand it even if I spoke using the standard French numerical system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Las aerolíneas que aún ofrecen tarifas por duelo son muy pocas y descuentan apenas el valor de los viajes funerarios de último momento. Las compañías aéreas que los ofrecen son Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa, para vuelos que inician en EE. UU. o Canadá, y WestJet. En todos los casos, usted tiene que hacer la reserva telefónicamente y en forma directa con la aerolínea.
mt: Airlines that still offer bereavement fares are few and discount only the value of last-minute funeral trips. The airlines that offer them are Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa, for flights that begin in the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you have to make the reservation by phone and directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Posiblemente, el modo más simple y conveniente de navegar estando fuera de su país es instalar aplicaciones de navegación GPS en su teléfono inteligente. Se puede ahorrar dinero comprando mapas nuevos para GPS, un dispositivo GPS independiente, o también rentar uno en cualquier agencia de alquiler de automóviles. Si no cuenta con una conexión de datos para su teléfono o cuando está fuera de alcance, puede tener un rendimiento reducido o puede no funcionar.
mt: The simplest and most convenient way to navigate when abroad is to install GPS navigation apps on your smartphone. You can save money by buying new GPS maps, an independent GPS device, or also renting one at any car rental agency. If you don't have data connection for your phone or when out of range, it may have reduced performance or may not work.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
