ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: El Valle de Cochamó es el destino para escalar más popular de Chile y es conocido como el Yosemite de Sudamérica, con variedad de extensos muros y riscos de granito. Las cumbres también ofrecen vistas impactantes desde los picos. Escaladores de todos los rincones del globo constantemente delimitan nuevos caminos entre sus muros de potencial infinito.
mt: The Cochamó Valley is the most popular destination for climbing in Chile and is known as the Yosemite of South America, with variety of extensive granite walls and cliffs. The summits also offer stunning views from the peaks. Climbers from all corners of the globe constantly define new routes between its walls of infinite potential.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Si quiere viajar alrededor del mundo circunscribiéndose al hemisferio sur, se reducirán sus opciones de vuelos y destinos pues escasean las rutas transoceánicas. Ninguna alianza aérea abarca el cruce de los tres océanos en el hemisferio sur (y SkyTeam no cubre ninguno). No obstante, Star Alliance cubre todo a excepción de la porción este del Pacífico Sur que se extiende desde Santiago de Chile hasta Tahití, zona que corresponde a los vuelos de LATAM Oneworld. Si se desea evitar el Pacífico Sur y el límite oeste de Sudamérica, tiene otras opciones además de este vuelo (ver abajo).
mt: If you want to travel around the world confining yourself to the southern hemisphere, your options for flights and destinations will be limited as transoceanic routes are scarce. No airline alliance covers the crossing of the three oceans in the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none). However, Star Alliance covers everything except for the eastern portion of the South Pacific that extends from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, an area that corresponds to LATAM's Oneworld flights. If you want to avoid the South Pacific and the western limit of South America, you have other options besides this flight (see below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: A nivel mundial, existen cerca de 200 organizaciones de turismo para corredores. La mayoría opera de manera independiente. Go! Running Tours, sucesora de Global Running Tours, conecta en cuatro continentes a docenas de proveedores de visitas guiadas al trote. Con origen en el Running Tours Barcelona, de esa ciudad, y el Running Copenhagen, de esta otra, rápidamente se le unieron el Running Tours Prague con base en Praga y otros más.
mt: Globally, there are about 200 running tourism organizations. Most operate independently. Go! Running Tours, successor to Global Running Tours, connects in four continents to dozens of providers of guided running tours. Originating in Running Tours Barcelona, of that city, and Running Copenhagen, of this other, quickly joined Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: Es probable que los safaris sean el mayor atractivo turístico de África y la parte más memorable para muchos visitantes. El uso popular del término safari hace referencia a los viajes por tierra para ver la sorprendente vida salvaje de África, en particular en la sabana. Algunos animales, como los elefantes y las jirafas, suelen aproximarse a los vehículos y el equipo estándar hará posible una buena visión. En ocasiones, leones, los guepardos y los leopardos pueden ser tímidos, por lo que tendrá más oportunidad de observarlos usando binoculares. La excursión conocida como safari a pie (también denominada «paseo entre los arbustos», «safari de senderismo» o «caminata») consiste en hacer senderismo, ya sea por unas horas o por varios días.
mt: Safaris are probably the biggest tourist attraction in Africa and the most memorable part for many visitors. The popular use of the term safari refers to overland trips to see the amazing wildlife of Africa, particularly in the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, often approach vehicles and standard equipment will allow for good viewing. On occasion, lions, cheetahs, and leopards can be shy, so you will have more opportunity to observe them using binoculars. The walking safari (also known as "bush walk", "hiking safari" or "hike") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or for several days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Las excursiones son más económicas para grupos de más personas, así que, si está solo o con un único amigo, procure conocer gente y formar un grupo de cuatro a seis para obtener una mejor tarifa por cada uno. No obstante, no debería preocuparse por esto ya que, con frecuencia, los turistas se mezclan entre sí para completar los automóviles. En verdad, parece ser más una forma de engañar a la gente para hacerles creer que tiene que pagar más.
mt: Tours are cheaper for groups of more people, so if you're alone or with just one friend, try to meet people and form a group of four to six to get a better rate per person. However, you shouldn't worry about this as tourists often mix together to fill up the cars. In fact, it seems to be more of a way to trick people into thinking they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: A pesar de que la economía de San Francisco está relacionada a su condición de atractivo turístico a nivel global, la misma es diversa. Las industrias laborales más destacadas son los servicios profesionales, el trabajo estatal, las finanzas, las actividades comerciales y las turísticas. El hecho de que sea evocada con frecuencia en canciones, películas, obras de literatura y en la cultura popular ha colaborado para que la ciudad y sus monumentos sean famosos a nivel mundial. Con una gran variedad de hoteles, restaurantes e instalaciones para convenciones de primer nivel, San Francisco ha ido desarrollando una gran infraestructura turística. Asimismo, San Francisco es una de las mejores ciudades de EE. UU. donde encontrar otro tipo de gastronomía asiática, tales como las de Corea, Tailandia, la India y Japón.
mt: Despite its global tourist appeal, San Francisco's economy is diverse. The most prominent labor industries are professional services, state work, finance, commerce, and tourism. Its frequent mention in songs, movies, literature, and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks famous worldwide. With a wide variety of high-end hotels, restaurants, and convention facilities, San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure. San Francisco is also one of the best U.S. cities to find another type of Asian cuisine, such as Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: La reserva de alojamiento con antelación al viaje le brinda la tranquilidad de que tendrá un lugar en donde dormir cuando arribe a su destino. Los agentes de viajes suelen tener acuerdos con hoteles específicos, aunque a través de ellos también es posible reservar otro tipo de alojamiento, como zonas de campamento. Por lo general, los agentes de viajes ofrecen paquetes que incluyen el desayuno, traslados desde y hasta el aeropuerto, e incluso paquetes combinados de vuelos y alojamiento. También pueden guardarle la reserva en caso de que necesite tiempo para pensar mejor la oferta, o para obtener otros documentos para su destino (como, por ejemplo, la visa). Sin embargo, cualquier modificación o solicitud se debe realizar a través del agente de viajes en primer lugar, y no directamente a través del hotel.
mt: Reserving accommodation in advance of your trip gives you the peace of mind that you will have a place to stay when you arrive at your destination. Travel agents usually have agreements with specific hotels, although through them it is also possible to reserve other types of accommodation, such as camping areas. In general, travel agents offer packages that include breakfast, transfers from and to the airport, and even combined flight and accommodation packages. They can also keep the reservation in case you need time to think better the offer, or to obtain other documents for your destination (such as, for example, the visa). However, any modification or request must be made through the travel agent first, and not directly through the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Aplicaciones de traducción instantáneas: son aquellas que pueden generar, en forma automática, traducciones de segmentos completos de texto de un idioma a otro. Entre este tipo de aplicaciones podemos encontrar algunas que hasta traducen en idiomas extranjeros los textos de carteles u otros objetos del mundo real si el usuario enfoca su teléfono inteligente en tales objetos. Los motores de traducción han mejorado drásticamente y ahora, con frecuencia, brindan traducciones bastante correctas (y rara vez contenido sin sentido); no obstante, debe tenerse algo de precaución, ya que todavía es posible que fallen. Una de las principales aplicaciones en esta categoría es Google Translate, que realiza la traducción sin conexión si se descargan los datos del idioma con el que se trabajará.
mt: Instant translation applications: these are those that can automatically generate translations of complete text segments from one language to another. Among this type of applications we can find some that even translate foreign texts of signs or other objects in the real world if the user focuses their smartphone on such objects. Translation engines have improved dramatically and now, often, provide quite accurate translations (and rarely nonsense content); however, one should be a bit cautious, as they can still fail. One of the main applications in this category is Google Translate, which performs translation without connection if the data of the language to be worked with is downloaded.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Las avalanchas no son algo anormal; las pendientes pronunciadas únicamente resisten cierta cantidad de nieve, por lo que el exceso caerá en forma de aludes. El problema radica en que la nieve es pegajosa, motivo por el cual requiere algo de activación para caer, y eso que cae puede ser el desencadenante del resto. A veces, el factor que las desencadena es el sol que derrite la nieve, otras veces, es una nueva nevada u otros eventos naturales, y con frecuencia, es el ser humano.
mt: Avalanches are not uncommon; steep slopes can only support a certain amount of snow, so excess will fall as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it requires some activation to fall, and what falls can be the trigger for the rest. Sometimes, the factor that triggers them is the sun that melts the snow, other times, it is a new snowfall or other natural events, and often, it is human activity.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: El curry es una receta a base de hierbas y especias y que se sirve con carne o vegetales. Podemos encontrar curry «seco» y «húmedo», en función del volumen de líquido. En los pueblos del interior del norte de la India y Pakistán, se suele usar el yogur en el curry. En el sur de la India y en otros sectores costeros del subcontinente, es habitual consumir leche de coco.
mt: Curry is a recipe based on herbs and spices and served with meat or vegetables. We can find «dry» and «wet» curry, depending on the amount of liquid. In the villages of the interior of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is usually used in the curry. In the south of India and other coastal sectors of the subcontinent, it is common to consume coconut milk.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: La carretera (o autopista) de McMurdo al Polo Sur es un camino de 1600 km desde la base McMurdo, en el mar de Ross, hasta el Polo. Se trata de nieve compactada, con grietas rellenas y señalizadas con banderas. Solo pueden circular por allí tractores especiales, cargando trineos con combustible u otros suministros. Estos no son demasiado ágiles, debido a lo cual el camino debe dar un largo giro rodeando las montañas Transantárticas para alcanzar la meseta.
mt: The McMurdo to South Pole Road is a 1600 km snow-packed road from McMurdo Station, in the Ross Sea, to the South Pole. It is compacted snow, with filled and flagged cracks. Only specially equipped tractors can travel on it, carrying sleds with fuel or other supplies. These are not very agile, so the road must make a long detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Una fantástica forma de contemplar todo el encanto de la región del sur África es ingresar en automóvil, lo que, a su vez, le permitirá acceder a lugares fuera de las rutas turísticas habituales. Esto puede hacerse en un automóvil común con un cauteloso planeamiento, pero lo más recomendable es hacerlo en una 4x4; además, hay muchos lugares a los que solo se puede acceder con una 4x4 con amplia distancia entre ejes. Cuando planifique su viaje, tenga en consideración que, a pesar de que África del Sur es estable, no todos los países que la rodean lo son. En cuanto a los requisitos y costos para obtener su visa, ello dependerá del país de donde provenga y, además, varía de país en país. Además, cada país tiene leyes propias que determinan qué artículos de emergencia deben encontrarse dentro del automóvil.
mt: A fantastic way to take in all the charm of South Africa's southern region is to enter by car, which will also allow you to access places off the usual tourist routes. This can be done in a common car with a cautious planning, but it is best to do it in a 4x4; there are many places that can only be accessed with a 4x4 with a wide axle spacing. When planning your trip, keep in mind that, despite South Africa being stable, not all the countries that surround it are. As for the requirements and costs to obtain your visa, this will depend on the country you come from and, in addition, varies from country to country. In addition, each country has its own laws that determine what emergency items must be found inside the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Llevar cosas de otros: Jamás pierda de vista su equipaje, en especial cuando cruce fronteras internacionales. Podría encontrarse con que lo están utilizando como un trasportador de psicofármacos sin que usted siquiera lo sepa, lo que le traerá muchísimos problemas. Esto incluye esperar en fila, ya que, en cualquier momento, y sin previo aviso, pueden usarse los perros detectores de drogas. Algunos países imponen castigos excesivamente draconianos, con penas de hasta 10 años o la muerte, incluso hasta para quienes cometan un delito por primera vez. El equipaje que se descuida se vuelve un objetivo de robos y, al mismo tiempo, atrae la atención de las autoridades, que se encuentran alertas ante posibles amenazas de bomba.
mt: Never lose sight of your luggage, especially when crossing international borders. You could find yourself with the authorities using it as a drug mule without you even knowing it, which will bring you a lot of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as at any time, without prior notice, drug-sniffing dogs can be used. Some countries impose excessively draconian penalties, with sentences of up to 10 years or death, even for first-time offenders. Luggage that is neglected becomes a target for thefts and, at the same time, attracts the attention of authorities, who are on the lookout for possible bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Colme su hogar con un exquisito café en la mañana y con un relajante té de manzanilla en la noche. Cuando usted se encuentra de vacaciones en su casa, cuenta con el tiempo necesario para darse un gusto y dedicar unos minutos más para cocinar un plato especial. Si se anima a experimentar una mayor aventura, aproveche la oportunidad de tomar jugo o de mezclar algunos de los batidos: Tal vez encuentre una bebida para el desayuno fácil de preparar para cuando regrese a su rutina diaria. Si usted vive en una ciudad con una cultura variada de bebidas, visite bares o pubs en vecindarios a los que no suela ir.
mt: Wake up your home with an exquisite coffee in the morning and with a relaxing chamomile tea in the evening. When you are on vacation at home, you have the time necessary to treat yourself and dedicate a few more minutes to cook a special dish. If you dare to experiment a greater adventure, take advantage of the opportunity to take juice or mix some of the smoothies: Maybe you will find a drink for breakfast easy to prepare for when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied culture of drinks, visit bars or pubs in neighborhoods you do not usually go.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: El pueblo de Haldarsvík tiene excursiones a la cercana isla de Eysturoy y cuenta con una iglesia atípica con forma octogonal. En el camposanto, hay interesantes esculturas de mármol con forma de paloma sobre algunas tumbas. Merece la pena dedicar media hora a dar un paseo por el fascinante pueblo.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík has excursions to the nearby island of Eysturoy and has an atypical octagonal church. In the cemetery, there are interesting marble sculptures in the shape of a dove on some graves. It is worth spending half an hour strolling through the fascinating village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Aun cuando pueda no necesitar una visa para estadías cortas en ciertos destinos si viaja como turista o por negocios, viajar a esos mismos lugares como estudiante internacional por lo general implica una estadía más prolongada que una visita ocasional de índole turística. Por lo general, para permanecer en cualquier país extranjero por un extenso período de tiempo será preciso obtener una visa por anticipado. Por lo general, las visas de estudiantes involucran requisitos y procedimientos de solicitud diferentes de aquellas visas normales de turismo o negocios. En la mayor parte de los países le exigirán una carta de oferta hecha por la institución donde tenga intenciones de estudiar y, además, demostrar que cuenta con fondos para mantenerse durante, al menos, el primer año del curso. Haga averiguaciones en la institución y en la oficina de inmigración del destino donde pretende estudiar, a fin de tomar conocimiento en detalle los requisitos.
mt: Even though you may not need a visa for short stays in certain destinations if you travel as a tourist or on business, traveling to those same places as an international student generally involves a longer stay than an occasional tourist visit. In general, to stay in any foreign country for an extended period of time, you will need to obtain a visa in advance. In general, student visas involve different requirements and application procedures than normal tourist or business visas. In most countries, they will require an offer letter from the institution where you intend to study and to demonstrate that you have funds to support yourself for at least the first year of the course. Check with the institution and the immigration office of the destination where you intend to study to take detailed knowledge of the requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Si decide hacer una caminata por la selva tropical, deberá cuidarse de los mosquitos, sobre todo durante el verano. Aun si está conduciendo por la selva subtropical y abre las puertas solo unos segundos para entrar al vehículo, eso es suficiente para que los mosquitos suban con usted.
mt: If you decide to go for a walk in the tropical rainforest, you should be careful of the mosquitoes, especially during the summer. Even if you are driving through the subtropical rainforest and open the doors just a few seconds to get in the vehicle, that is enough for the mosquitoes to get in with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Los Sundarbans son la cadena de manglares costeros más grande del mundo, con una longitud de 80 km (50 millas) desde la costa hacia el interior de Bangladesh y de la India. La UNESCO ha declarado a los Sundarbans patrimonio de la humanidad. La sección del bosque dentro del territorio indio se denomina Parque Nacional Sundarbans. Sin perjuicio de ello, los bosques no son solo manglares, sino que poseen algunos de los últimos árboles que quedan de las junglas imponentes que alguna vez cubrieron la llanura de Gangetic. El Sundarbans comprende un área de 3850 km2 y cerca de un tercio de su extensión está cubierto por agua o zonas pantanosas. Los Sundarbans han sido, desde 1966, un templo de la vida silvestre y se calcula que en la actualidad existen en el área 400 tigres reales de Bengala y unos 30 000 ciervos moteados.
mt: The Sundarbans are the largest mangrove forest in the world, stretching 80 km (50 miles) inland from the coast of Bangladesh and India. The UNESCO has declared the Sundarbans a World Heritage Site. The forest section within Indian territory is called the Sundarbans National Park. However, the forests are not just mangroves, but also possess some of the last remaining trees of the once-imposing jungle that covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3850 km2 and about a third of its extent is covered by water or marshland. The Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary since 1966, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Bengal tigers and 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Los Sundarbans son la cadena de manglares costeros más grande del mundo, con una longitud de 80 km (50 millas) desde la costa hacia el interior de Bangladesh y de la India. La UNESCO ha declarado a los Sundarbans patrimonio de la humanidad. La sección del bosque dentro del territorio indio se denomina Parque Nacional Sundarbans. Sin perjuicio de ello, los bosques no son solo manglares, sino que poseen algunos de los últimos árboles que quedan de las junglas imponentes que alguna vez cubrieron la llanura de Gangetic. El Sundarbans comprende un área de 3850 km2 y cerca de un tercio de su extensión está cubierto por agua o zonas pantanosas. Los Sundarbans han sido, desde 1966, un templo de la vida silvestre y se calcula que en la actualidad existen en el área 400 tigres reales de Bengala y unos 30 000 ciervos moteados.

The Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary since 1966, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Bengal tigers and 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: En todo el planeta, existen más de 5000 idiomas distintos, entre los cuales más de veinte son hablados por 50 millones de personas, o más. En general, aquello que se comunica por escrito es más sencillo de comprender que lo que se dice de forma oral. Claro ejemplo de ello es el caso de las direcciones, que muchas veces son difíciles de pronunciar de manera que se entienda. Un alto número de países enteros hablan con total fluidez el inglés y en aún muchos más puede esperarse encontrar cierto conocimiento del idioma, en particular entre los más jóvenes. Imagínese, por dar un ejemplo, a un mancuniano, un bostoniano, un jamaiquino y un ciudadano de Sídney sentados en la mesa compartiendo una cena en un restaurante de Toronto. Se deleitan mutuamente con historias de sus ciudades natales, narradas con sus distintos acentos y su jerga local.
mt: There are more than 5000 distinct languages spoken around the world, of which more than twenty are spoken by 50 million people or more. In general, that which is written is easier to understand than that which is spoken. A clear example of this is the case of directions, which are often difficult to pronounce so that they can be understood. A large number of countries speak English fluently, and in even more can be expected to find some knowledge of the language, particularly among the younger generations. Imagine, for example, a Mancunian, a Bostonian, a Jamaican, and a Sydneyan sitting at the table sharing a meal in a restaurant in Toronto. They delight each other with stories of their hometowns, narrated with their different accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Los autobuses parten de la estación entre distritos (al otro lado del río) durante todo el día, aunque la mayoría, en especial los que viajan al este y a Jakar (también llamada Bumthang), salen entre las 6:30 y las 7:30 h. Debido a que los autobuses entre distritos con frecuencia están llenos de pasajeros, es recomendable adquirir un boleto con unos días de anticipación. Casi todos los distritos cuentan con el servicio autobuses Coaster japoneses, los cuales son cómodos y resistentes. Compartir un viaje en taxi es una forma ágil y cómoda de trasladarse a lugares cercanos, como Paro (150 ngultrums) y Punakha (200 ngultrums).
mt: Buses depart from the district station throughout the day, though most, especially those going east and to Jakar (also called Bumthang), leave between 6:30 and 7:30 a.m. Because buses between districts are often full of passengers, it is recommended to purchase a ticket with a few days' notice. Almost all districts have the service of Japanese Coaster buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Sharing a taxi ride is a quick and comfortable way to get to nearby places, such as Paro (150 ngultrums) and Punakha (200 ngultrums).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Ello, sumado a que resulta relativamente inaccesible, ha dado a «Tombuctú» una imagen de tierra exótica y lejana. Si bien hoy Tombuctú es una ciudad empobrecida, aún cuenta con un aeropuerto y su reputación hace que sea un atractivo turístico. En 1990, fue incorporado al listado de lugares del patrimonio de la humanidad en riesgo, producto de la amenaza de las arenas del desierto. Fue una de las paradas más importantes del especial Maravillas del mundo africano, de Henry Louis Gates, en PBS. La ciudad contrasta mucho con las restantes del país, ya que posee un estilo más árabe que africano.
mt: This, combined with the fact that it is relatively inaccessible, has given "Timbuktu" an image of exotic and distant desert. While today Timbuktu is a poor city, it still has an airport and its reputation makes it a tourist attraction. In 1990, it was included in the list of world heritage sites at risk, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the stops on the special African World Wonders, by Henry Louis Gates, on PBS. The city contrasts much with the rest of the country, as it has a more Arab than African style.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Los Juegos Paralímpicos tendrán lugar entre el 24 de agosto y el 5 de septiembre de 2021. Un número de eventos se desarrollarán en otros puntos de Japón. Anfitriona del evento deportivo en 1964, Tokio será la única ciudad asiática en haber sido sede de dos Juegos Olímpicos de verano. Si reservó sus vuelos y el alojamiento para 2020 antes del anuncio del aplazamiento, es posible que surjan complicaciones. Existen diferentes tipos de pólizas de cancelación de viajes, pero desde finales de marzo, la cobertura de gran parte de estas pólizas basadas en el coronavirus no se extiende hasta julio de 2020, que es para cuando están programados los Juegos Olímpicos. Se espera que la mayoría de las entradas a los eventos tengan un costo de entre JPY 2500 y JPY 130 000 y que los pases comunes cuesten JPY 7000.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will take place between August 24 and September 5, 2021. A number of events will be held in other parts of Japan. Host of the sporting event in 1964, Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the announcement of the postponement, there may be complications. There are different types of travel cancellation policies, but since late March, the coverage of most of these coronavirus-based policies does not extend until July 2020, when the Olympics are scheduled. It is expected that most of the tickets to the events will cost between JPY 2500 and JPY 130 000 and that the common passes will cost JPY 7000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Un tornado es cilindro giratorio de aire a muy baja presión que succiona hacia adentro y arriba el aire a su alrededor. Producen grandes vientos (con frecuencia de 100-200 millas/hora) y pueden levantar objetos pesados en el aire, llevándolos consigo mientras el tornado se desplaza. Inician como embudos que bajan de las nubes de tormenta y se transforman en tornados cuando entran en contacto con el suelo.
mt: A tornado is a rotating column of air at very low pressure that sucks in the air around it. They produce large winds (often 100-200 miles per hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them with them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels that drop from storm clouds and become tornados when they contact the ground.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Si su país de destino queda sujeto a una alerta de viaje, ello podría afectar su seguro de asistencia médica o el de cancelación de viaje. Es posible que quiera consultar las recomendaciones de otros gobiernos, pero están pensadas para sus propios ciudadanos. Por ejemplo, un visitante norteamericano en Medio Oriente podría enfrentar situaciones distintas a las de un europeo o un árabe. Las advertencias de viaje son tan solo un resumen conciso de la situación política en otro país. Los puntos de vista que se presentan suelen ser superficiales, genéricos y demasiado simplificados en comparación con la información más detallada disponible en otros sitios.
mt: If your destination country is under a travel warning, this may affect your medical or trip cancellation insurance. You may want to consult the recommendations of other governments, but they are intended for their own citizens. For example, a North American visitor to the Middle East may face different situations than a European or Arab. Travel warnings are only a concise summary of the political situation in another country. The points of view presented are often superficial, generic, and too simplified compared to the more detailed information available on other sites.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Las agencias de viajes han existido desde el siglo XIX. Por lo general, un agente de viajes es una buena opción para casos en que el viajero no cuenta con experiencia previa en cuestiones como la naturaleza, la cultura, el idioma o los países de bajos ingresos. Si bien gran parte de las agencias están dispuestas a asumir casi todo tipo de reservas tradicionales, muchos agentes se especializan en cierto tipo de viajes, rangos de presupuestos o destinos específicos. Puede ser mejor contactar a un agente que haga reservas frecuentes de viajes similares al suyo. Consulte los viajes promocionados por el agente. Puede hacerlo en una página web tanto como en el escaparate de un negocio.
mt: Travel agencies have existed since the 19th century. In general, a travel agent is a good option for cases in which the traveler has no previous experience in matters such as nature, culture, language or low-income countries. While most agencies are willing to assume almost any traditional reservations, many agents specialize in a certain type of travel, budget ranges or specific destinations. It may be better to contact an agent who makes frequent reservations similar to yours. Check out the agent's promoted trips. You can do it on a website as well as in the storefront of a business.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Son muchas las cuestiones a considerar antes y al momento de viajar a algún destino. Al viajar, prepárese para que no todo sea como «en casa». Habrá ciertas diferencias en cosas como los modales, la legislación, los alimentos, el tráfico, el alojamiento, las normas, el idioma, entre otros. Esto debe tenerse siempre presente a fin de ahorrarse decepciones e, incluso, algún disgusto producto de las formas locales de hacer las cosas.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during travel to a destination. When traveling, prepare for things not to be like "at home". There will be certain differences in things like manners, legislation, food, traffic, lodging, norms, language, etc. This should always be kept in mind in order to avoid disappointments and even some discomforts due to local ways of doing things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Si es su primer viaje a un país en vías de desarrollo o a un lugar que jamás ha ido, no menosprecie el posible impacto cultural. Más de un viajero estable y capaz se ha visto superado por las novedades que involucran los viajes a países en vías de desarrollo, donde muchos pequeños ajustes culturales pueden acumularse con rapidez. En especial durante los primeros días, considere la posibilidad de gastar una buena suma de dinero en hoteles, comida y servicios de buena calidad y de estilo occidental. Es recomendable no dormir sobre un colchón o una colchoneta en el piso en zonas donde no esté familiarizado con la fauna local. Si va a acampar, lleve un catre o una hamaca para guardar la distancia con las serpientes, los escorpiones y afines.
mt: If it is your first trip to a developing country or a place you have never been before, do not underestimate the cultural impact. More than one capable traveler has been overwhelmed by the novelty of travel to developing countries, where many small cultural adjustments can accumulate quickly. Especially during the first few days, consider the possibility of spending a good amount of money on hotels, food and services of good quality and Western style. It is recommended not to sleep on a mattress or a sleeping pad on the floor in areas where you are not familiar with the local fauna. If you are camping, bring a cot or hammock to keep a distance from snakes, scorpions and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

Más de un viajero estable y capaz se ha visto superado por las novedades que involucran los viajes a países en vías de desarrollo, donde muchos pequeños ajustes culturales pueden acumularse con rapidez. En especial durante los primeros días, considere la posibilidad de gastar una buena suma de dinero en hoteles, comida y servicios de buena calidad y de estilo occidental. Es recomendable no dormir sobre un colchón o una colchoneta en el piso en zonas donde no esté familiarizado con la fauna local. Si va a acampar, lleve un catre o una hamaca para guardar la distancia con las serpientes, los escorpiones y afines.
mt: If it is your first trip to a developing country or a place you have never been before, do not underestimate the cultural impact. More than one capable traveler has been overwhelmed by the novelty of travel to developing countries, where many small cultural adjustments can accumulate quickly. Especially during the first few days, consider the possibility of spending a good amount of money on hotels, food and services of good quality and Western style. It is recommended not to sleep on a mattress or a sleeping pad on the floor in areas where you are not familiar with the local fauna. If you are camping, bring a cot or hammock to keep a distance from snakes, scorpions and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Haga copias de su póliza y llévelas con usted, junto con la información de contacto de su compañía de seguros. Para obtener asesoramiento o autorizaciones y realizar reclamos, deben exhibir el correo electrónico de la aseguradora y sus números de teléfono internacionales. Guarde otra copia en la maleta y una digital (envíela por correo electrónico como archivo adjunto o súbala a la «nube»). En caso de viajar con una computadora portátil o una tableta, guarde una copia en la memoria o en el disco a la que pueda acceder sin servicio de Internet. También dele copias de la póliza y de los datos de contacto a aquellos con quien viaja y a familiares o amigos en su país que estén dispuestos a prestarle ayuda.
mt: Make copies of your policy and take them with you, along with your insurer's contact information. To obtain advice or authorizations and to file claims, they must display the insurer's email address and international phone numbers. Keep another copy in your suitcase and a digital one (send it as an attachment by email or upload it to the "cloud"). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy in memory or on a disk that you can access without Internet service. Also give copies of the policy and contact information to those you travel with and to family or friends in your country who are willing to help you.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: A través de los años, se han empleado numerosos formatos de películas. La estándar, de 35 mm (negativo de 36 por 24 mm), es la más habitual. En general, se puede reponer fácilmente si se agota y ofrece una resolución similar a la de la DSLR actual. Existen cámaras de películas con formato medio que usan uno de 6 por 6 cm, más específicamente, un negativo de 56 por 56 mm. Ello permite casi el cuádruple de resolución que con un negativo de 35 mm (3136 mm2 contra 864).
mt: Over the years, many film formats have been used. The standard, 35 mm (36 by 24 mm negative), is the most common. In general, it can be easily replenished if exhausted and offers a resolution similar to that of the current DSLR. There are cameras with a medium format that use one of 6 by 6 cm, more specifically, a negative of 56 by 56 mm. This allows almost four times the resolution of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 against 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: La manera más sencilla de comenzar en el negocio de la escritura sobre viajes es mejorar sus aptitudes en una página web de blogs de viajes establecida. Luego de que logre familiarizarse con el formateo y la edición en la web, podría estar listo para diseñar su propio sitio web.
mt: The easiest way to start in the business of writing about travel is to improve your skills on an established travel blog website. After you get familiar with the formatting and editing on the website, you may be ready to design your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

mt: The easiest way to start in the business of writing about travel is to improve your skills on an established travel blog website. After you get familiar with the formatting and editing on the website, you may be ready to design your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: En su país de origen, producto de esta permanente exposición a los gérmenes locales, es casi seguro que ya sea inmune a ellos. Sin embargo, en otras partes del mundo donde, donde usted no está familiarizado con la fauna bacteriológica, hay grandes posibilidades de que se presenten problemas. Asimismo, en climas con temperaturas más elevadas, las bacterias se desarrollan con mayor velocidad y logran vivir más tiempo fuera del cuerpo. De allí surgieron los flagelos de Delhi Belly, la maldición del faraón y la vendetta de Monteczuma y sus muchss amistades. De la misma manera que ocurre con los problemas respiratorios en climas más fríos, las condiciones intestinales en climas cálidos son bastante habituales y, aunque sin dudas molestas, en la mayoría de los casos no son realmente peligrosas.
mt: In your home country, as a result of this constant exposure to local germs, you are almost certainly immune to them. However, in other parts of the world where you are not familiar with the bacterial fauna, there are great chances that problems will arise. Likewise, in warmer climates, bacteria develop faster and can live longer outside the body. This is where the flagellum of Delhi Belly, the curse of the pharaoh, and the vendetta of Monteczuma and his many friends came from. Just as respiratory problems are common in colder climates, intestinal problems are common in warmer climates, and although certainly annoying, in most cases they are not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Europa es un continente relativamente pequeño, pero con muchos países independientes. Bajo circunstancias normales, viajar por varios países significaría tener que gestionar solicitudes de visa y controles de pasaporte varias veces. No obstante, el espacio Schengen funciona como un único país en este sentido. Por lo general, siempre que se mueva dentro de esta región podrá atravesar las fronteras sin pasar otra vez por un puesto de control de pasaportes. De la misma manera, al contar con un visado Schengen, no precisa gestionar permisos para cada uno de los países miembros de este espacio por separado. Ello le ahorrará tiempo, dinero y papeleo.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent, but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through several countries would mean having to deal with visa applications and passport checks several times. However, the Schengen area works as a single country in this respect. In general, whenever you move within this region you can cross the borders without going through another passport control point. Similarly, with a Schengen visa, you do not need to deal with permissions for each of the member countries of this area separately. This will save you time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tumba de Tutankamón (KV62). La tumba KV62 puede considerarse la más famosa en el Valle de los Reyes, escenario del descubrimiento por Howard Carter, en 1922, del casi intacto entierro real del joven faraón. No obstante, comparada con la mayor parte de las demás tumbas reales, la de Tutankamón apenas merece ser visitada, dado que su tamaño es mucho menor y está escasamente decorada. Cualquier interesado en observar los daños causados a la momia durante los intentos de extraerla del ataúd se decepcionaría, dado que solo son visibles la cabeza y los hombros. Actualmente, las joyas de la tumba no se encuentran allí, sino que han sido trasladadas al Museo Egipcio, en El Cairo. Para los visitantes con poco tiempo sería conveniente que lo invirtieran en otro lugar.
mt: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). The tomb KV62 can be considered the most famous in the Valley of the Kings, scene of the discovery by Howard Carter, in 1922, of the almost intact royal burial of the young pharaoh. However, compared to most of the other royal tombs, that of Tutankhamun barely deserves a visit, given that its size is much smaller and is sparsely decorated. Anyone interested in observing the damage caused to the mummy during attempts to extract it from the coffin will be disappointed, since only the head and shoulders are visible. Currently, the jewels of the tomb are not there, but have been moved to the Egyptian Museum, in Cairo. For visitors with little time it would be advisable to invest in another place.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: La isla de Bowen es un conocido viaje para hacer en un día o en un fin de semana y que incluye kayak, caminatas, tiendas comerciales, restaurantes y entre otros. En Howe Sound, exactamente junto a Vancouver, se encuentra esta auténtica comunidad a la que se puede llegar fácilmente en taxis acuáticos programados que parten desde Granville Island, en el centro de Vancouver. Para quienes encuentran placenteras las actividades al aire libre, una excursión por el corredor Sea to Sky no puede faltar. Whistler, que se encuentra a una hora y media en automóvil desde Vancouver, es costosa pero conocida por los Juegos Olímpicos de Invierno de 2010. Durante el invierno, disfrute algunos de los mejores sitios de esquí de Norteamérica y, en verano, experimente el auténtico ciclismo de montaña.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend destination that includes kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants and more. In Howe Sound, just outside Vancouver, is this authentic community that can be easily reached by water taxis departing from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a Sea to Sky Highway excursion cannot be missed. Whistler, which is an hour and a half drive from Vancouver, is expensive but known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of North America's best skiing and, in the summer, experience the real mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls es una ciudad en el oeste de Zimbabwe, pasando la frontera con Livingstone, Zambia, y cercana a Botswana. La ciudad se ubica junto a las cataratas, que son su principal atractivo, pero este conocido destino turístico también ofrece, tanto a aventureros como a viajeros, un gran número de opciones para una estancia de mayor duración. En época de precipitaciones (de noviembre a marzo), el caudal de agua crecerá y las cataratas serán más impresionantes. No dude que terminará mojado si atraviesa el puente o recorre los senderos sinuosos próximos a las cataratas. Por otra parte, es precisamente debido al elevado volumen de agua que su visión de las cataratas reales se verá obstruida ¡por toda el agua!
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in western Zimbabwe, bordering Livingstone, Zambia, and close to Botswana. The city is located next to the falls, which are its main attraction, but this well-known tourist destination also offers, both to adventurers and travelers, a large number of options for a longer stay. During the rainy season (November to March), the water flow will increase and the falls will be more impressive. Don't be surprised if you get wet crossing the bridge or walking the winding paths near the falls. On the other hand, it is precisely due to the high volume of water that your view of the real falls will be obstructed by all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Las reglas de la fotografía regular resultan también de aplicación a la grabación de videos, posiblemente, incluso más. Si no se permite tomar una fotografía de algo, entonces ni siquiera debería pensar en filmarlo. Si se utiliza un dron, se deben verificar antes qué puede filmarse y qué permisos o licencias extra se necesitan. Aun cuando sea legal en su región, no suele ser una buena idea hacer volar un dron en las inmediaciones de un aeropuerto o por encima de una multitud.
mt: The rules of regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If you are not allowed to take a photograph of something, then you should not even think about filming it. If you are using a drone, you should check beforehand what can be filmed and what extra permits or licenses you need. Even if it is legal in your region, it is usually not a good idea to fly a drone in the vicinity of an airport or over a crowd.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: El registro es una exigencia adicional para el proceso del visado. En algunos países, tendrá que registrar su presencia y la dirección de su alojamiento con las autoridades locales. Esto podría requerir que se llene un formulario ante la policía local o que se presente en la oficina de inmigración. En muchos países en los que rigen leyes de este tipo, los hoteles locales se ocuparán de hacer el registro (no se olvide de consultar). En otros casos, solo quienes se hospeden fuera de alojamientos turísticos necesitan registrarse. No obstante, esto hace que la ley sea mucho más incierta, así que haga averiguaciones de antemano.
mt: The registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you will have to register your presence and the address of your lodging with local authorities. This may require filling out a form with the local police or presenting yourself at the immigration office. In many countries where such laws apply, local hotels will take care of the registration (don't forget to check). In other cases, only those staying outside tourist accommodations need to register. However, this makes the law much more uncertain, so check ahead.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

mt: The registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you will have to register your presence and the address of your lodging with local authorities. This may require filling out a form with the local police or presenting yourself at the immigration office. In many countries where such laws apply, local hotels will take care of the registration (don't forget to check). In other cases, only those staying outside tourist accommodations need to register. However, this makes the law much more uncertain, so check ahead.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Trabajar como voluntario mientras se encuentra de viaje es una forma extraordinaria de marcar la diferencia, pero el objetivo no es solo el de dar. Vivir y ser voluntario en un país del extranjero es una excelente forma de llegar a conocer una cultura distinta, personas nuevas, aprender sobre usted mismo, tener un sentido de perspectiva e, incluso, adquirir habilidades nuevas. También podría ser una buena forma de estirar el presupuesto y permitir una estadía más larga, ya que muchos trabajos voluntarios ofrecen alojamiento y comida, y algunos pagan una pequeña remuneración.
mt: Volunteering while traveling is an extraordinary way to make a difference, but the goal is not just to give. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is an excellent way to get to know a different culture, new people, learn about yourself, gain a sense of perspective, and even acquire new skills. It could also be a good way to stretch your budget and allow for a longer stay, as many volunteer jobs offer housing and food, and some pay a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: El viaje a Walt Disney World es, para muchas familias de los Estados Unidos, una gran peregrinación. La visita «típica» consiste en volar al Aeropuerto Internacional de Orlando, tomar un autobús hacia un hotel dentro del complejo de Disney, permanecer alrededor de una semana sin salir de dicha área y regresar a casa. Existen infinitas variantes posibles, pero esto continúa siendo a lo que la mayoría de la gente se refiere cuando habla de «ir a Disneylandia». Muchos de los pases disponibles en la red, en páginas web de subastas como eBay o Craigslist, son boletos Park Hopper de varios días, parcialmente usados. A pesar de ser una práctica muy habitual, en Disney está prohibida: los pases no son transferibles.
mt: A trip to Walt Disney World is, for many American families, a great pilgrimage. The "typical" visit consists of flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a hotel within the Disney complex, staying around a week without leaving that area, and returning home. There are infinite possible variations, but this is what most people are referring to when they talk about "going to Disneyland." Many of the passes available on the Internet, on auction sites like eBay or Craigslist, are multi-day Park Hopper passes, partially used. Despite being a very common practice, in Disney it is prohibited: passes are not transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Cualquier persona que esté programando un viaje a un país que podría tildarse como zona de guerra debería recibir un entrenamiento profesional. Es probable que al buscar «Curso sobre zonas hostiles» en Internet se encuentre la dirección de una compañía local. Normalmente, un curso abarcará todos los temas que se han tratado aquí con mucho más detalle y, en general, con experiencia práctica. Un curso normalmente dura entre 2 y 5 días, e incluye juegos de rol, primeros auxilios, y hasta en ocasiones entrenamiento con armas. Los libros y las revistas acerca de la supervivencia en la naturaleza son comunes, pero las publicaciones que tratan sobre las zonas de guerras son escazas.
mt: Any person planning a trip to a country that could be considered a war zone should receive professional training. It is likely that a search for "Hostile Zone Course" on the Internet will find the address of a local company. A typical course will cover all the topics discussed here in much greater detail and, in general, with practical experience. A typical course will last between 2 and 5 days, and will include role-playing, first aid, and in some cases, weapons training. Books and magazines on survival in the wilderness are common, but publications on survival in war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Se conocen distintos métodos para purificar el agua, algunos atacan más eficazmente a ciertas amenazas concretas. En algunos, lugares basta con hervir agua durante un minuto, en otros, son necesarios varios más. No todos los filtros tienen la misma efectividad y, si esto le preocupa, debería considerar comprarse agua embotellada con sello de una compañía certificada.
mt: There are different methods to purify water, some attack more effectively certain concrete threats. In some places, it is enough to boil water for a minute, in others, it is necessary to do it for several more. Not all filters have the same effectiveness and, if this worries you, you should consider buying bottled water with a seal from a certified company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Las corrientes de retorno son el flujo que retrocede de las olas que rompen en la orilla, frecuentemente en un arrecife o similar. A causa de la topología submarina, el flujo de retorno se reúne en ciertas zonas de mayor profundidad y allí puede originarse una corriente rápida con dirección a aguas profundas. La mayor parte de los decesos se producen a causa de la fatiga que provoca el intentar nadar en contra de la corriente, lo que quizás sea imposible. En cuanto logre escapar de la corriente, nadar de regreso no serán más complejo de lo habitual. Haga el intento de llegar hasta algún lugar donde no lo alcance otra vez o, si cuenta con las habilidades y alguien lo ha visto, podría ser conveniente esperar a que lo rescaten.
mt: Return currents are the backwash of waves breaking on the shore, often on a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topography, the return current gathers in certain areas of greater depth and there a fast current may form with a direction towards deep waters. Most deaths occur due to the fatigue of trying to swim against the current, which may be impossible. Once you escape the current, swimming back will not be more difficult than usual. Try to reach a place where it won't reach you again or, if you have the skills and someone has seen you, it may be convenient to wait to be rescued.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Los canales navegables internos pueden ser una buena temática para las vacaciones. Por ejemplo, visitar castillos del valle del Loira, del valle del Rin, tomar un crucero hacia destinos interesantes por el Danubio, o recorrer en bote el canal de Erie. También delimitan las rutas para populares caminos de senderismo y ciclismo.
mt: Inland waterways can be a good theme for vacations. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley, taking a cruise to interesting destinations on the Danube, or hiking and biking along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: La región limita con el Sahel al norte, y con el Océano Atlántico al sur y al oeste. Mujeres: Se aconseja que todas las visitantes femeninas digan estar casadas, sin importar cuál sea su estado civil real. Será también de utilidad usar un anillo (solo procure que no luzca demasiado costoso). Las mujeres deben darse cuenta de que las diferencias culturales pueden provocar lo que ellas consideran acoso, y que no es poco común que sean seguidas, tomadas por el brazo, etc. Sea rotunda al rechazar a los hombres y no tema defender su postura (existan diferencias culturales o no, ¡eso no es correcto!).
mt: The region borders the Sahel to the north, and the Atlantic Ocean to the south and west. Women: It is advised that all female visitors say they are married, regardless of their real marital status. It will also be helpful to wear a ring (just make sure it doesn't look too expensive). Women should be aware that cultural differences may lead to what they consider harassment, and that it is not uncommon to be followed, taken by the arm, etc. Be firm in rejecting men and do not hesitate to defend your position (cultural differences or not, that is not acceptable!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
